Organizations and individuals producing poultry breeding eggs must satisfy the following conditions : a) The conditions specified in Clause 2 Article 22 of this Law; b/Study eggs exploited from parental breed stock or equivalent or higher grades. 6. Organizations and individuals trading livestock breed eggs and larvae must have application standard announcement dossiers and breed dossiers as prescribed in Point dd Clause 2 Article 22 of this Law.
Luật Chăn nuôi@24: Requirements for quality of male and female breeders in production 1. Any male breeder used in breed production must meet the following requirements: a) Having clear curriculum vitae and genealogical system; b) The breed is produced by a breed production facility and conformable with the applied quality; c) Any male breeder used in a sperm production establishment for commercial purposes shall undergo an individual productivity test and shall satisfy the quality requirements as regulated. 2. Female breeders used in breed production must satisfy the following requirements: a) Having clear curriculum vitae and genealogical system; b) The breed is produced by a breed production facility, conformable with the applied quality announced and conformable with quality regulations. 3. The Minister of Agriculture and Rural Development shall prescribe the quality of male and female breeds.
Luật Chăn nuôi@25: Rights and obligations of producers and traders of livestock breed products 1. Every facility producing and trading livestock breed products has the following rights : a) produce and trade livestock breed products when meeting all conditions specified in Article 22 and 23 of this Law; b) enjoy state policies applied to producers and traders of livestock breed products; c) make complaints, denunciations and file lawsuits against production and trading of livestock breed products as per law provisions; d) keep secret of information about production and trading of livestock breed products, except for the case requested by competent state agencies. 2. Every facility producing and trading livestock breed products has the following obligations : a) declare livestock breeding as prescribed in Article 54 hereof; b) satisfy conditions applied to producers and traders of livestock breed products during the production and trading; c/To keep breed dossiers for at least 3 years from the date of production or trading; d) Provide the buyer of livestock breed products with the application including information about name, address of production facility, name of livestock breed, quantity of livestock breed products sold, family tree for cattle, declaration of applied standards and breeding process; dd) ensure and take responsibility for quality of livestock breed products in conformity with applied standards; e) Recall livestock breed products failing to meet requirements concerning type, origin and quality and make compensation for any loss or damage in accordance with laws; g) Comply with the inspection of competent authorities.
Luật Chăn nuôi@26: Testing of livestock breeds and lines 1. Livestock breed and line testing means the raising and monitoring of a specific livestock breed or line under certain conditions and for a certain period of time to determine the difference, stability and uniformity in productivity, quality and disease resistance and assess the harmful effects of such breed or line. 2. New livestock breeds and lines must be tested before being put into production, except for livestock breeds and lines created from the results of ministerial-level or national science and technology tasks which have been recognized or permitted by competent agencies. 3. Organizations and individuals wishing to recognize new livestock breeds and lines shall conduct tests according to national technical regulations on testing of livestock breeds and lines at establishments eligible for testing of livestock breeds and lines. 4. The Minister of Agriculture and Rural Development shall promulgate national technical regulations on livestock breed and line testing.
Luật Chăn nuôi@27: Requirements for livestock breed and line testing facilities Livestock breed and line testing facilities must meet the following conditions: 1. Livestock breed and line testing facilities must satisfy the following conditions : 1. The conditions prescribed in Article 55 of this Law; 2. Having material foundations and technical equipment and facilities suitable to the assay of corresponding livestock breeds and lines; 3. Technicians who possess university or higher degree in husbandry, veterinary medicine or biology must be available; 4. Applying appropriate quality management systems.
Luật Chăn nuôi@28: Livestock breed and line verification 1. Livestock breed and line verification refers to the assessment and re-certification of productivity, quality and disease resistance of livestock breeds and lines after they are put into production. 2. Livestock breed and line verification shall be carried out in the following cases: a) There are complaints or denunciations about quality of livestock breeds or lines; b) There is a request for solicitation or assessment of a competent authority; c) At the request of organizations and individuals. 3. The Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Development shall announce the livestock breed and line testing facilities eligible for conducting livestock breed and line inspection.
Luật Chăn nuôi@29: Rules for naming new livestock breeds and lines 1. Each livestock breed or line shall be given only one appropriate name in Vietnamese. 2. The naming of new livestock breeds and lines must not fall into the following cases: a) The name is identical or confusingly similar to the recognized livestock breed or line name; b) Only include digits; c) Violations against national history, culture, ethics, fine traditions and customs; d) The name is the same as the spelling of the name of a leader, national hero or famous person; e/Using names of state agencies, people's armed forces units, political organizations, socio-political organizations, socio-political-professional organizations, social organizations or socio-professional organizations, unless they are approved by these agencies, units or organizations.
Luật Chăn nuôi@30: Recognition of new livestock breeds and lines 1. An application for recognition of new livestock breeds and lines includes : a) An application form for recognition of new livestock breeds and lines, which specifies name, origin and origin of the breed or line; b) Testing results or results of ministerial-level or national science and technology tasks which have been recognized or permitted by competent authorities. 2. Recognition of new livestock breeds and lines shall be carried out according to the following procedures: a) The applicant shall submit 01 physical or electronic application specified in Clause 1 of this Article to the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Development. Within 03 working days from the day on which the application is received, the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Development shall inspect it. If the application is unsatisfactory, a written request shall be made to the applicant for completion; b) Within 15 days from the day on which the satisfactory application is received, the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Development shall carry out appraisal and assessment of the application. If the appraisal and assessment result is satisfactory, the Minister of Agriculture and Rural Development shall decide to recognize the new livestock breed or line; if the application is rejected, explanation must be provided.
Luật Chăn nuôi@31: Rights and obligations of livestock breed and line testing facilities 1. Livestock breed and line testing facilities shall have the following rights: a) Conduct livestock breed and line testing as per law provisions; b) conduct livestock breed and line testing as prescribed in Article 28 hereof; c) Receive payment for testing and inspection of livestock breeds and lines as per law provisions; d) Make complaints, denunciations and take legal proceedings against testing of livestock breeds and lines as per law provisions; dd) Refuse to provide information related to the implementation results, except for the case at the request of competent state agencies. 2. Livestock breed and line testing facilities shall have the following obligations: a) Satisfy the conditions of the testing facility during its operation; b) Take responsibility for the testing and inspection results; c) Comply with regulations of law on biosafety, epidemic safety and environmental protection; d) Keep the application for at least 03 years after the testing or inspection is completed; dd) Comply with the inspection of competent authorities.
Luật Chăn nuôi@32: Requirements for commercial animal feeds before marketing 1. Declare applicable standards and conformity in accordance with regulations of the Law on technical standards and regulations, product and goods quality. 2. The quality of the product is conformable with applied standards and corresponding technical regulations. 3. Production is carried out at the facility that has the Certificate of eligibility for animal feed production issued by a competent authority. 4. Publish animal feed product information on the portal of the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Development. 5. Labels or documents attached to animal feeds shall comply with Article 46 of this Law.
Luật Chăn nuôi@33: Declaration of complete feeds and concentrated feeds 1. Full compound feeds and concentrated feeds shall be published on the portal of the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Development by producers and traders. 2. An application for declaration of complete feeds and concentrated feeds includes : a) For domestically produced complete feeds and concentrated feeds, the documents specified in Points b, c, d, dd and e Clause 2 Article 34 of this Law; b) For imported complete feeds and concentrated feeds, documents specified in points b, c, d, dd, e and g clause 3 Article 34 of this Law. The application shall be the original or certified true copy and certified Vietnamese translation. 3. Organizations and individuals shall access the portal of the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Development to make self-declaration of complete feeds and concentrated feeds. The product information must be conformable with the declaration documents specified in Clause 2 of this Article. Right after self-declaration of product information, organizations and individuals may produce and trade in products and take self-responsibility for the quality and safety of the announced products. 4. Changes in information about complete feeds and concentrated feeds shall be made as follows: a) In case of change in the address of the manufacturing facility or product quality, the product information must be re-declared in accordance with Clause 2 and Clause 3 of this Article; b) In case of changes in information other than those specified in Point a of this Clause, the organization/individual shall make such changes on the portal of the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Development.
Luật Chăn nuôi@34: Declaration of feed additive products 1. Feed additive products must be appraised and published on the portal of the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Development. This regulation does not apply to single ingredients. 2. An application for declaration of domestically manufactured feed additive products includes : a) An application form for publishing product information; b) Certificate of eligibility for animal feed production; c) Contracts for lease or processing of animal feeds if the organizations or individuals lease or process animal feeds at the animal feed producing facilities which have been issued with certificates of eligibility for animal feed production; d) Applied standards, written notification of receipt of the declaration of conformity of the product; dd) The test report on the quality and safety criteria of the product specified in the applied standards and corresponding National technical regulation issued by a laboratory appointed or recognized by the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Development; e) Sample of product label. 3. An application for declaration of imported feed additive products includes : a) An application form for publishing product information; b) Certificate of free sale or equivalent issued by a competent authority of the country of origin; c) One of the certificates of ISO, Good Manufacturing Practice, Hazard Analysis and Critical Control Point (HACCP) or equivalent certificates of the manufacturing facility; d) The product information sheet provided by the manufacturer, including ingredients, uses, instructions; quality and safety criteria as prescribed by the Minister of Agriculture and Rural Development; dd) Applied standards of the applicant as prescribed by law on product quality; secondary labels of products in Vietnamese language as prescribed; e) The test report on the quality and safety criteria of the product issued by a laboratory appointed by a competent authority of the country of origin or recognized by an international or regional accreditation organization or a laboratory appointed or recognized by the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Development; g) Samples of labels provided by the manufacturer. The application shall be the original or certified true copy and certified Vietnamese translation. 4. An application for re-declaration of feed additive products includes : a) For domestically-produced feed additives, the provisions in point a clause 2 of this Article shall apply; b) For imported feed additives, comply with Point a Clause 3 of this Article. 5. The declaration of feed additive products shall be made as follows: a) The applicant shall access the portal of the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Development to submit the application for publishing feed additive product information as prescribed in Clauses 2,3 and 4 of this Article; b) Within 03 working days from the receipt of the application, the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Development shall check the documents. If the application is unsatisfactory, a notification shall be posted on the website for completion. Within 20 days from the day on which the satisfactory application is received, the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Development shall appraise it and publish the product information on its website. In case of rejection, explanation shall be provided. 6. The sale period of feed additive products is 05 years from the day on which the products are published on the portal by the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Development. Within 06 months before the expiration date, the organizations and individuals that wish to publish again the products shall comply with Clauses 4 and 5 of this Article.
Luật Chăn nuôi@35: Change Feed Additive Product Information 1. In case of change of name, address, phone number, fax number, email address of the applicant and package specifications of the feed additive product, the applicant shall change such information on the portal of the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Development. 2. In case of change of information about feed additive products in terms of name of manufacturer, address of manufacturer, product name, symbol of applied standards, product form, color, instructions and shelf life, the organization or individual must apply for change of information on the portal of the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Development according to the following documents and procedures: a) The application for change of information about feed additive products includes : a) An application for change of information includes an application form for change of information, the applied standards, the receipt of the declaration of conformity (if any ), sample of the product label and the Certificate of eligibility for animal feed production. For imported feed additives, the original or certified true copy of the producer's written confirmation of changes; certified true copy of the enterprise registration certificate or written confirmation of the competent authority in case of change of name of the manufacturer or trade name of imported animal feeds is required; b) Within 03 working days from the receipt of the application, the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Development shall inspect it. If the application is unsatisfactory, the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Development shall request the applicant to complete it. Within 15 days from the receipt of the satisfactory application, the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Development shall confirm and publish the changed information on its portal. In case of rejection of the application, explanation shall be provided. 3. The provisions of Clauses 1 and 2 of this Article do not apply to single materials.
Luật Chăn nuôi@36: Publishing of other animal feed products 1. The Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Development shall publish the following information on its portal on traditional feed products and single ingredients : a) Name of the product; b) Technical requirements of products. 2. Animal feeds not required to be published on the portal of the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Development include: a) Internal-use animal feeds are animal feeds that are self-mixed by the facility to serve its breeding needs and must not be exchanged and traded on the market; b) Ordered animal feeds are animal feeds produced under orders between the ordering facility and the supplier, which are only used internally of the ordering facility and not exchanged and traded on the market; c) Other animal feeds not specified in Clause 1 of this Article.
Luật Chăn nuôi@37: Animal feed testing 1. Animal feed testing means the assessment of quality and safety of animal feeds for livestock and the environment through experimental raising of livestock in each growth stage or production cycle. Contents of animal feed testing include: a) Analyze animal feed quality; b) Assess toxicity, safety for domestic animals and environment; c) Other contents according to particular characteristics of each type of animal feed. 2. Animal feeds imported for the first time from countries or territories which have not yet been recognized by Vietnam in terms of animal feed testing or recognition processes or produced in Vietnam and contain new substances which have not yet been tested in Vietnam must be tested before product announcement, except animal feeds created as a result of ministerial-or national-level scientific and technological tasks which have been recognized or permitted by competent agencies. 3. Livestock feed testing establishments must satisfy the following conditions: 1. Scope of operation: The establishment must have a certificate of eligibility for animal feed testing. a) The conditions specified in Article 55 of this Law; b) Facilities and technical equipment meet requirements for testing of each type of animal feeds; c) Technicians who possess a bachelor's degree or higher in animal husbandry, veterinary medicine, biology, food technology, or post-harvest technology. 4. The Minister of Agriculture and Rural Development shall promulgate a list of chemicals, biological products and microorganisms banned from use in animal feeds and a list of raw materials permitted for use as animal feeds; promulgate national technical regulations on animal feed testing and regulations on mutual recognition of animal feed testing and recognition processes with countries and territories conducting animal feed trading with Vietnam.
Luật Chăn nuôi@38: Conditions for animal feed production 1. Organizations and individuals producing commercial animal feeds and animal feeds on order must satisfy the following conditions: a/To produce commercial animal feeds and animal feeds on order; a) The production facility is not located in the area polluted by hazardous waste and toxic chemicals; b) Design the production area, arrange equipment according to the one-direction rule from input materials to output products, ensure separation between production areas to avoid cross-contamination; c) have lines and equipment suitable for production of animal feeds; d) have measures to preserve animal feed ingredients as recommended by suppliers; dd) adopt measures to control harmful organisms, impurities and waste causing contamination so as not to affect the safety and quality of animal feeds; e) Having measurement equipment and tools which are inspected and adjusted as prescribed; g) Have or hire laboratories to analyze quality of animal feeds during the production; h) Technicians who possess a bachelor's degree or higher in animal husbandry, veterinary medicine, biology, food technology, or post-harvest technology; i) Establishments producing animal feeds containing antibiotics must take control measures to prevent spreading and cross-contamination between different antibiotics, between animal feeds containing antibiotics and animal feeds without antibiotics; k) Having measures to protect environment meeting the provisions of law on environmental protection. 2. Producers of animal feeds for internal use must satisfy the conditions specified in Points a, b, d, dd, e, g, i and k Clause 1 of this Article, except for production of animal feeds for internal use in household farming. 3. The Government shall elaborate Clause 1 of this Article.
Luật Chăn nuôi@39: Grant, re-grant and revocation of certificates of eligibility for animal feed production 1. Competence in issuance, re-issuance and revocation of certificates of eligibility for animal feed production is specified as follows: a) The Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Development shall issue, re-issue and revoke certificates of eligibility for animal feed production to additional animal feed production facilities; b) Provincial People's Committees shall issue, re-issue and revoke certificates of eligibility for animal feed production in their provinces, except for the case specified in Point a of this Clause. 2. A certificate of eligibility for animal feed production may be re-granted in the following cases : a) The property is lost or damaged; b) Information about the organization or individual specified in the Certificate of eligibility for animal feed production is changed. 3. The Certificate of eligibility for animal feed production shall be revoked in the following cases: a) The Certificate of eligibility for animal feed production is erased or modified; b) The establishment no longer satisfies the conditions specified in Clause 1, Article 38 of this Law; c) The facility commits other violations for which the certificate of eligibility for animal feed production is revoked as prescribed by law. 4. The Government shall provide for application and procedures for issuance, reissuance and revocation of certificates of eligibility for production of commercial animal feeds.
Luật Chăn nuôi@40: Conditions for trading in animal feeds 1. Having equipment and tools for animal feed preservation under the guidance of producers and suppliers. 2. Animal feed display and sale places and animal feed warehouses must be separated from each other or must not be polluted by pesticides, fertilizers and other toxic chemicals. 3. Take measures to prevent and control harmful organisms.
Luật Chăn nuôi@41: Import of animal feeds 1. Imported animal feeds must undergo state quality inspection as prescribed in Clause 4 Article 43 of this Law. 2. Livestock feed importers must own or hire livestock feed warehouses which satisfy requirements on food quality and safety under law and recommendations of suppliers. 3. Organizations and individuals shall only import animal feeds whose information has been posted on the portal of the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Development. Import of animal feeds that have not been published on the portal of the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Development for display at trade fairs, exhibitions, for adaptation, for research, for analysis at laboratories or for production and processing for export purposes must be licensed by the Minister of Agriculture and Rural Development. 4. The Minister of Agriculture and Rural Development shall consider and decide to inspect legislative documents, enforcement system, conditions for animal feed production and laboratories in exporting countries in accordance with regulations of Vietnam law and international treaties to which the Socialist Republic of Vietnam is a signatory in the following cases: a) Assessment for mutual recognition; b) Discovery of risks to quality, environment, food safety and disease safety of animal feeds imported into Vietnam. 5. The Government shall elaborate this Article.
Luật Chăn nuôi@42: Export of animal feed 1. Profile and quality of exported animal feeds must meet the requirements of organizations, individuals and importing countries and comply with the provisions of Vietnamese law. 2. The export of animal feeds must comply with this Law and other relevant laws.
Luật Chăn nuôi@43: State inspection of animal feed quality 1. State inspection of animal feed quality must comply with this Law, the Law on Product and Goods Quality and other relevant laws. 2. Contents of state inspection of quality of domestically produced and sold commercial animal feeds include : a) Declaration of applied standards and conformity (if any); b) Adoption of measures for animal feed quality control; c) Labeling of animal feeds; d) Take animal feed samples to inspect the conformity of products with applied standards, corresponding national technical regulations and other relevant regulations of law, focusing on inspection and assessment of safety and main substances in animal feeds. 3. State inspection of quality of internal-use animal feeds, animal feeds ordered or traditional feeds includes sampling of animal feeds to inspect safety indicators specified in relevant national technical regulations and other relevant laws. 4. Scope of state inspection of quality of imported animal feeds includes the following contents : a) Inspection of import dossiers; b) Physical inspection of quantity, weight, packaging specifications, labeling, expiry date, origin and other sensory criteria of the products; c) Sampling of animal feeds for testing and assessment of conformity of quality and safety of products. 5. State inspection of quality of exported animal feeds covers the following contents : a) Inspect the documents about the declaration of quality and conformity (if any); b) Physical inspection of packaging specifications, labeling, expiry date and appearance of products; c) Conduct quality analysis at the request of the importer. 6. Contents of state inspection of exported animal feeds which are recalled or returned include : a) Inspection of reasons for the recall or return of exported animal feeds; b) Physical inspection of packaging specifications, labeling, expiry date and appearance of products; c) Sampling of animal feeds for inspection of quality and safety of products. 7. Handling of violations of regulations on livestock feed quality is provided as follows : a) Producers and traders of animal feeds shall incur administrative penalties or criminal prosecution depending on the severity of their violations against regulations on quality of animal feeds; b) Handle animal feeds that fail to meet quality standards by correcting information, recycling, repurposing, re-exporting and destroying them. 8. The Government shall elaborate this Article.
Luật Chăn nuôi@44: Sampling and testing of animal feed 1. Samples for state inspection of animal feed quality shall be taken under national standards or regulations of the Minister of Agriculture and Rural Development. 2. Persons taking animal feed samples for state management work must possess animal feed sampling certificates granted by the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Development. 3. Results of animal feed testing for state management purpose shall be recognized only by testing methods in laboratories designated by the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Development. In case testing methods are not designated or agreed upon, the Minister of Agriculture and Rural Development shall decide on provisional testing methods. 4. Testing grounds include quality criteria announced for application by product manufacturers or suppliers, safety criteria specified in relevant national technical regulations and other relevant laws.
Luật Chăn nuôi@45: Animal feed containing antibiotics 1. Antibiotics used in animal feeds must be veterinary drugs permitted for circulation in Vietnam. 2. Antibiotics may only be used in animal feed production according to prescriptions of persons possessing animal disease prevention and treatment practice certificates under the animal health law to prevent diseases in young animals and treat infected animals. 3. The use of animal feeds containing antibiotics must comply with instructions of animal feed producers or suppliers. 4. Animal feeds containing antibiotics must contain information about name and content of antibiotics, instructions for use and time of discontinuation of antibiotic use on labels or attached documents. 5. The Government shall provide criteria for young animals permitted to use animal feeds containing antibiotics for disease prevention and the roadmap for abolishing the use of antibiotics for disease prevention in livestock.
Luật Chăn nuôi@46: Labeling animal feeds 1. Labeling of animal feeds shall comply with regulations of law on goods labels and the following regulations: a) For commercial animal feeds, labels or attached documents must show information on product name, main ingredient, quality criteria, place of production, date of production, shelf life, preservation instructions, use instructions; information on organizations and individuals responsible for the goods to ensure the requirements for traceability of product origin; b) For other animal feeds, the label or attached documents must contain information to identify and trace the origin of the product. 2. The Minister of Agriculture and Rural Development shall provide guidelines for labeling of animal feeds.
Luật Chăn nuôi@47: Animal feed advertising 1. Organizations and individuals advertising livestock feeds shall comply with the law on advertisement. 2. Animal feed advertisement contents must be conformable with product information posted on the portal of the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Development.
Luật Chăn nuôi@48: Rights and obligations of animal feed production facilities 1. Every animal feed producer has the following rights: a) be entitled to state policies on animal feed production and trading; b) produce animal feeds in accordance with regulations of this Law and other relevant regulations of law; c) make complaints and denunciations or file a lawsuit against violations against regulations on animal feed production as per law provisions; d) Commercial animal feed producers, apart from the rights specified in Points a, b and c of this Clause, may process animal feeds in accordance with regulations of law. 2. Every animal feed producer has the following obligations : a) satisfy conditions applied to animal feed production facilities during their operation; b) Formulate and implement procedures for quality control of animal feeds, ensure that animal feeds conform to applied quality standards and corresponding national technical regulations, ensure traceability of animal feed products and archive procedures for quality control of animal feeds; c) Only animal feed products and ingredients in accordance with regulations of law are used; ingredients used in finished products must have a shelf life at least equal to that of finished products; d) Comply with inspection of production conditions and quality of animal feeds carried out by competent state agencies; take legal responsibility for quality of animal feeds produced by their facilities; dd) Commercial animal feed production facilities must announce applied standards, conformity, label animal feeds and retain all required documents at the facilities as per law; keep production log and animal feed testing results for at least 02 years; retain animal feed samples for at least 30 days from the expiry date of products; make periodic or ad hoc reports on animal feed production as per the Minister of Agriculture and Rural Development's regulations and fulfill obligations specified in Points a, b, c and d of this Clause.
Luật Chăn nuôi@49: Rights and obligations of animal feed trading, exporting and importing establishments 1. Every trading, exporting or importing facility of animal feeds has the rights to : a) enjoy state policies related to livestock feed trading; b) trade, export and import animal feeds in accordance with regulations of this Law and other relevant regulations of law; c) make complaints, denunciations and file lawsuits related to trading, export and import of animal feeds as per law provisions. 2. Every trading, exporting or importing facility of animal feeds has the following obligations : a) satisfy conditions applied to trading, exporting and importing facilities during their operation; b) Comply with regulations of law on assurance of quality and information about origin of animal feeds; c) Apply measures to preserve product quality as recommended by producers to maintain quality of animal feeds; d) post up prices and comply with inspection of animal feed prices; dd) Comply with inspection of conditions for trading, export, import and quality of animal feeds carried out by competent authorities; e) Do not trade, export or import products containing substances banned from use in animal feeds; g) Only trade and import animal feeds announced on the portal of the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Development; h) Record and store information about animal feeds during the trading, export and import to ensure traceability; i) Formulate procedures for assessment and selection of producers or suppliers of imported animal feeds; formulate and implement plans for inspection of quality of imported animal feeds to ensure conformity with sale contracts, applied standards and technical regulations.
Luật Chăn nuôi@50: Rights and obligations of animal feed users 1. Every user of animal feeds has the rights to : a) be provided with sufficient information on quality, origin, price and instructions for use of animal feeds from suppliers; b) make complaints, denunciations and file lawsuits related to use of animal feeds as per law provisions; c) Receive compensation for damage as prescribed by law. 2. Every user of animal feeds has the following obligations: a) Use animal feeds that meet food quality and safety requirements for human, animal and environmental health; b) Comply with regulations of law and instructions of animal feed suppliers on transport, storage, preservation and use of animal feeds; c) Comply with inspection of animal feed quality carried out by competent state agencies; d) cooperate in handling animal feeds and animal products that fail to meet quality and safety requirements as per law provisions; dd) Keep a log of use of animal feeds containing antibiotics as regulated.
Luật Chăn nuôi@51: Rights and obligations of animal feed testing facilities 1. Every animal feed testing facility has the following rights: a) be allowed to conduct animal feed testing as per law provisions; b) be paid for animal feed testing as per law provisions; c) make complaints, denunciations and file lawsuits related to animal feed testing as per law provisions. 2. Every animal feed testing facility is obliged to : a) satisfy conditions applied to animal feed testing facilities during their operation; b) take responsibility for animal feed testing results; c) Archive animal feed testing dossiers for at least 03 years; d) Comply with inspection of animal feed testing by competent authorities.
Luật Chăn nuôi@52: Livestock production scale 1. Livestock production scale includes the following types: a) Livestock farms, including large-scale, medium-scale and small-scale livestock farms; b) Family farms. 2. The Government shall elaborate this Article.
Luật Chăn nuôi@53: Livestock units and husbandry density 1. Livestock unit means a unit of cattle or poultry converted according to their live weight, regardless of breed, age and sex. Each livestock unit is equivalent to 500 kg of live weight of livestock. 2. Breeding density is calculated by total number of livestock units per 01 hectare of agricultural land. 3. Livestock production scale must be determined according to livestock density. 4. The Government shall regulate the livestock density in each region on the basis of the strategy for livestock development, livestock technology and ecological environment. 5. Provincial People's Committees shall, based on the animal husbandry density of each region, regulate the animal husbandry density of provinces and centrally-affiliated cities.
Luật Chăn nuôi@54: Declaration of livestock production activities 1. Livestock production entities and persons must declare their livestock production activities to commune-level People's Committees. 2. The Minister of Agriculture and Rural Development shall specify types and quantity of livestock to be declared, time and forms of declaration of livestock breeding.
Luật Chăn nuôi@55: Farm husbandry 1. Livestock farms must meet the following requirements: a) The location of the farm must be conformable with the local and regional socio-economic development strategy and animal husbandry development strategy; satisfy requirements for animal husbandry density specified in Clause 4 and Clause 5 Article 53 of this Law; b) Have sufficient water sources to ensure quality for animal husbandry and livestock waste treatment; c) Measures for environmental protection are taken in accordance with regulations of law on environmental protection; d) Having stables and breeding equipment suitable to each type of livestock; dd) Have documents recording the process of animal husbandry, use of animal feeds, veterinary drugs, vaccines and other information to ensure the traceability; retain documents for at least 01 year after the end of the breeding cycle; e) The farm must be located at a safe distance from the livestock farming area to the affected subjects and from the source of pollution to the farm. 2. Organizations and individuals performing large-scale livestock husbandry must be granted certificates of eligibility for livestock husbandry. 3. The Minister of Agriculture and Rural Development shall provide for safe distance in farm animal husbandry to ensure biosafety, disease and environmental safety.
Luật Chăn nuôi@56: Family farming Family farms must meet the following requirements: 1. The raising facilities must be separated from the human residence places; 2. To regularly clean, disinfect and decontaminate breeding facilities and tools; 3. Take appropriate measures to ensure epidemic prevention; collect and treat livestock waste, wastewater, carcasses and other livestock waste in accordance with regulations of law on veterinary medicine and environmental protection.
Luật Chăn nuôi@57: Rights and obligations of livestock production organizations and individuals 1. Livestock production entities and persons shall have the following rights: a) Organizations and individuals that have declared their livestock production activities as prescribed in Article 54 herein shall be entitled to compensation for damage and production restoration in case of natural disasters or epidemics as per law provisions; b) be entitled to state policies on animal husbandry; c) Receive training in animal husbandry; d) Advertising products as prescribed by law; dd) make complaints and denunciations or file a lawsuit against violations against regulations on animal husbandry as per law provisions. 2. Every animal husbandry organization/individual shall : a) declare livestock breeding activities as prescribed in Article 54 hereof; b) Apply biosafety and environmental hygiene measures in animal husbandry; c) Livestock waste shall be treated in accordance with regulations of law on environmental protection; d) Ensure the humane treatment for domestic animals as prescribed by law.
Luật Chăn nuôi@58: Issue, re-issue and revocation of certificates of eligibility for large-scale livestock production 1. Provincial People's Committees shall have the power to issue, reissue and revoke certificates of eligibility for animal husbandry. 2. A certificate of eligibility for animal husbandry shall be reissued in the following cases: a) The property is lost or damaged; b) Information about the organization/individual specified in the Certificate is changed. 3. The Certificate of eligibility for animal husbandry shall be revoked in the following cases: a) The Certificate is erased or modified; b) The farm animal breeding establishment no longer satisfies the conditions specified in Article 55 of this Law; c) The farm animal husbandry establishment commits other violations which are subject to revocation of the Certificate of eligibility for animal husbandry as per law provisions. 4. The Government shall regulate application documents, processes and procedures for issuance, re-issuance and revocation of the Certificate of eligibility for animal husbandry.
Luật Chăn nuôi@59: Waste treatment in farm animal husbandry 1. Livestock waste includes solid waste of organic origin, livestock effluents, exhaust gases and other waste. 2. The treatment of organic solid wastes is specified as follows: a) Owners of livestock farms shall treat organic solid waste meeting national technical regulations before using such waste for plants or aquatic feed; b) Organic solid waste that has not been treated must be transported from the livestock farm to the treatment facility by specialized vehicles and equipment; c) Livestock die of epidemic diseases and other hazardous waste must be treated as prescribed by law on veterinary and environmental protection. 3. Livestock wastewater treatment is regulated as follows: a) Owners of livestock farms shall be responsible for collecting and treating livestock effluents in conformity with national technical regulations on livestock effluents before discharging them into receiving waters in accordance with regulations of the Law on environmental protection; b) Livestock wastewater treated in conformity with national technical regulations on livestock wastewater used for plants; c) Livestock wastewater that has not been treated must be transported from the livestock farm to the treatment facility by specialized vehicles and equipment. 4. Owners of livestock farms shall be responsible for treating exhaust gases from livestock production activities in conformity with national technical regulations on livestock exhaust gases. 5. Treatment of other wastes must comply with the law provisions on veterinary medicine and environmental protection.
Luật Chăn nuôi@60: Waste treatment in household farming Farmer must comply with the following requirements: 1. To take measures to treat livestock manure, wastewater and exhaust gases, ensuring environmental sanitation and not affecting people around them; 2. Livestock die of epidemics and other hazardous wastes must be treated according to the law provisions on veterinary medicine and environmental protection.
Luật Chăn nuôi@61: Noise management in animal husbandry 1. Noise in livestock production includes noise generated from livestock and equipment used in livestock production. 2. Owners of farm facilities and household farmer's households must handle noise generated from animal husbandry activities in conformity with national technical regulations on noise in animal husbandry.
Luật Chăn nuôi@62: Management of livestock waste treatment products 1. Products for treatment of livestock waste before being sold on the market must meet the following requirements: a) Declare applicable standards and conformity in accordance with laws; b) The quality is conformable with the applied standards; c) Information about products posted on the portal of the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Development; d) Products for treatment of animal waste which are produced or imported into Vietnam for the first time and contain new substances which have not been tested in Vietnam must be tested before product announcement. 2. The Government shall elaborate this Article.
Luật Chăn nuôi@63: Management of facilities manufacturing livestock waste treatment products 1. Management of facilities manufacturing livestock waste treatment products includes the following activities: a) Production sites must be located in areas not polluted by hazardous waste; b) The environmental impact assessment report or environmental protection plan as prescribed by law on environmental protection; c) Production lines and equipment suitable for production of products; d) Measurement devices and instruments used for quality supervision and accuracy assurance in accordance with laws on measurement; dd) Warehouses for waste treatment products and animal products that need separate storage; e) Technicians who possess a bachelor's degree or higher in animal husbandry, veterinary medicine, chemistry, biotechnology, or environmental technology. 2. The Government shall elaborate this Article.
Luật Chăn nuôi@64: Yield management 1. Attracting swifts means using technical measures to attract swifts to build nest in swifts house. 2. Activities of farming swifts include attracting, hatching, raising swifts and exploiting swifts nests. 3. Organizations, individuals having activities of farming swifts in zones of farming swifts must ensure environment, noise, prevention of epidemics and food safety as prescribed by law. 4. The Government shall elaborate this Article.
Luật Chăn nuôi@65: Honeybee farming management 1. Bees raised for honey are bees that have been domesticated and must ensure epidemic safety. 2. Organizations and individuals rearing honeybees shall ensure epidemic safety for their honeybee colonies, environmental sanitation in beekeeping places and food hygiene and safety for products exploited from honeybees. 3. The Minister of Agriculture and Rural Development shall provide for the distance between honeybee positions, methods of moving honeybee colonies, plants, honey bee culture flower zones, and use of honeybees for pollination of plants.
Luật Chăn nuôi@66: Management of dogs and cats Owners of dogs and cats shall comply with the following requirements: 1. To give rabies vaccination to dogs and cats according to the provisions of law on veterinary medicine; 2. When suspecting that dogs or cats show rabies symptoms, to immediately report them to commune-level People's Committees or animal-rearing or animal health workers and handle them under the law on animal health; 3. To take measures to ensure safety for people and other domestic animals, to maintain environmental sanitation and ensure veterinary hygiene conditions; 4. Compensate for damage caused by the attack by the dog or cat in accordance with regulations of law.
Luật Chăn nuôi@67: Sika deer farming management 1. Organizations and individuals may only raise sika deer which have been tamed and of lawful origin and shall take responsibility before law for the origin of reared sika deer. 2. Organizations and individuals rearing sika deer must have breeding facilities suitable to the biological characteristics of sika deer, ensuring safety for humans and other domestic animals, environmental sanitation, veterinary hygiene, epidemic prevention and food safety conditions according to law. 3. The Government shall elaborate this Article.
Luật Chăn nuôi@68: Management of other animal husbandry 1. Organizations and individuals are entitled to raise other animals specified in Articles 64,65,66 and 67 of this Law and other animals on the list of other animals permitted for raising. 2. The Government shall promulgate the list of other animals permitted for raising. The Minister of Agriculture and Rural Development shall prescribe the raising of other animals on the list of other animals permitted for raising.

Having stables and breeding space suitable to livestock; 2. To supply adequate food and drinking water, ensuring hygiene; 3. Luật Chăn nuôi@70: Humane treatment of livestock in transport Organizations and individuals transporting domestic animals shall satisfy the following requirements: 1. The transport of domestic animals must comply with the following regulations : 1. Use appropriate vehicles and equipment for transporting livestock, ensure clear space and minimize injuries and fears to livestock; 2. To provide sufficient feeds and drinking water for domestic animals; 3. Do not beat or torture animals.
Luật Chăn nuôi@71: Humane treatment of livestock in slaughter Livestock slaughterhouses shall satisfy the following requirements: 1. The slaughterhouse shall be responsible for the slaughter of the livestock and the livestock; 1. Having a hygienic place for keeping livestock; supplying drinking water suitable to livestock pending slaughter; 2. To refrain from causing fear and pain to domestic animals; not to beat or persecute domestic animals; 3. Take measures to cause the animal's syncope before slaughter; do not let the animal witness the slaughter of its allograft.
Luật Chăn nuôi@72: Humane treatment of livestock in scientific research and other activities 1. Livestock used in scientific research and other activities must be treated humanely as prescribed in Articles 69,70 and 71 of this Law. 2. The humane treatment of domestic animals must be respectful and harmonious with belief, religion and traditional culture activities and approved by the social community.
Luật Chăn nuôi@73: Livestock slaughter 1. Livestock slaughter must comply with regulations of law on veterinary medicine, food safety and humane treatment for livestock. 2. Slaughterhouses must have documents on the origin of livestock to ensure the traceability of the origin of livestock put to slaughter.
Luật Chăn nuôi@74: Trading, processing and preliminary processing of animal products 1. Establishments trading, preparing and processing animal products must comply with regulations of law on veterinary medicine, food safety and environmental protection. 2. Animal products traded, prepared or processed must have clear origin to ensure traceability of their origin. 3. Trading in animal products in the area where the disease is declared shall comply with regulations of law on veterinary medicine. 4. Do not use additives, substances supporting the preparation/processing of animal products that are expired, not on the list of substances permitted for use or on the list of substances permitted for use but exceed the permissible limit; chemicals of unknown origin, chemicals banned from use in the preparation/processing of animal products as prescribed by law.
Luật Chăn nuôi@75: Preservation of animal products 1. The preservation of animal products at the premises, at the display and sale places and during transport must comply with regulations of law on veterinary medicine, food safety and environmental protection. 2. Do not use additives, substances supporting the preservation of animal products that are expired, not on the list of substances permitted for use or on the list of substances permitted for use but exceed the permissible limit; chemicals of unknown origin or banned substances for the preservation of animal products as per law provisions. 3. Specify time, duration and technical regulations on preservation of animal products.
Luật Chăn nuôi@76: Foreseeing the animal product market 1. The Ministry of Industry and Trade shall forecast market demand for animal products and the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Development shall forecast supply of animal products and publish such forecast on specialized newsletters and mass media. 2. The Ministry of Industry and Trade and the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Development shall update domestic animal product prices and markets on weekly basis, on international market on monthly basis and according to state management requirements and publish such information on specialized newsletters and mass media.
Luật Chăn nuôi@77: Export of livestock and animal products 1. Organizations and individuals are allowed to export livestock products and livestock not included in the List of livestock breeds prohibited from export. 2. Documents and quality of livestock and animal products exported must meet the requirements of exporters and importing countries and comply with regulations of Vietnam law.
Luật Chăn nuôi@78: Import of livestock and animal products 1. Livestock and animal products imported must have documents on clear origin, meet food quality, safety and disease resistance as per law provisions. 2. Livestock and animal products imported before entering the territory of the Socialist Republic of Vietnam at the prescribed border checkpoint must undergo inspection of food quality and safety and disease resistance in accordance with regulations of Vietnam's law. 3. The Minister of Agriculture and Rural Development shall consider and decide to inspect legislative documents, enforcement system and requirements for production and trading of livestock and animal products in the country of origin in accordance with regulations of Vietnam law and international treaties to which the Socialist Republic of Vietnam is a signatory in the following cases: a) Assessment for mutual recognition; b) Livestock and animal products imported for the first time from the country of origin; c) Discovery of risks of animal products imported into Vietnam that may affect quality, environment, food safety and disease safety; d) In case imported animal products pose high risk of food safety and disease safety, inspection of production and supply facilities in the country of origin shall be carried out before importation is permitted. 4. Animal products imported in violation of law on food quality, safety and epidemic safety shall be recalled and handled as per law provisions. 5. The Government shall elaborate Point d Clause 3 of this Article; import of live animals for food and border checkpoints where live animals are permitted to be imported into Vietnam.
Luật Chăn nuôi@79: Responsibilities of the Government, Ministries and ministerial-level agencies 1. The Government shall perform the uniform state management of animal husbandry nationwide. 2. The Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Development shall act as the focal point to assist the Government in performing the state management of animal husbandry nationwide and have the following responsibilities: a) Formulate and direct the implementation of strategies, plans and schemes in animal husbandry; b) promulgate or request competent authorities to promulgate and organize the implementation of policies and legislative documents on animal husbandry; c) Formulate national technical standards and regulations on animal husbandry; stipulate quality criteria that must be announced; formulate and provide guidelines for good husbandry practice; d) Organize statistical work, basic investigation and reporting in animal husbandry; dd) Scientific research and application of high technology, advanced technology and new technology; e) Formulate and implement programs and plans for training in professional knowledge and skills in animal husbandry; g) organize dissemination of information and education about laws on animal husbandry; h) Inspect, examine and settle complaints and denunciations, and take actions against violations of the law on animal husbandry within its power; i) Act as a contact point for international cooperation in animal husbandry. 3. Relevant Ministries and ministerial agencies shall, within their tasks and powers, cooperate with the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Development in performing state management of animal husbandry.
Luật Chăn nuôi@80: Responsibilities of People's Committees at all levels 1. Within the ambit of their tasks and powers, provincial-level People's Committees shall : a) Perform state management of animal husbandry within their management; b) promulgate within its competence or request competent authorities to promulgate documents providing guidelines for and organize the implementation of law on animal husbandry in the province; formulate and promulgate local technical regulations on animal husbandry; c) Formulate local animal husbandry development strategies in conformity with national animal husbandry development strategies and local socio-economic development strategies; d) Build and organize concentrated zones for livestock production, animal feed production and processing in association with waste treatment and environmental protection; dd) Direct and organize propagation, dissemination, training and education of law on animal husbandry; e) Inspect, examine and settle complaints and denunciations, take actions against violations within its power and cooperate in taking actions against violations of animal husbandry in the province; g) Allocate and lease out land, establish land fund, ensure water resources for animal husbandry development and planting of plants used as raw materials for animal feeds, and central slaughterhouses within their competence; issue, reissue and revoke certificates of eligibility for animal husbandry of large-scale animal farms; h) Submitting to the provincial People's Councils for decision the areas in the inner city of cities, towns, townships, residential areas not permitted for livestock husbandry, decision on swifts farming zones and support policies upon relocation of livestock husbandry facilities out of the areas not permitted for livestock husbandry. 2. District-level People's Committees, within the ambit of their tasks and powers, have the following responsibilities: 1. To direct the district-level People's Committees in managing and protecting the forests and forest land in their localities; a) Direct and organize propagation and dissemination of knowledge about education of law on animal husbandry; b) Allocate, lease out and establish land funds within their competence to develop animal husbandry and plant raw materials for animal feeds; c) Manage and develop livestock production in localities; make statistics, assess and provide assistance for livestock production facilities after natural disasters and epidemics; d) Inspect, examine, settle complaints and denunciations, and take actions against violations against the law on animal husbandry within their districts. 3. Within the ambit of their tasks and powers, commune-level People's Committees have the following responsibilities: 1. Hiến pháp@1: The Socialist Republic of Vietnam is an independent, sovereign, unified and territorial integrity country, which consists of the mainland, islands, sea and air space.
Hiến pháp@2: 1. The Socialist Republic of Vietnam is a law-governed socialist state of the People, of the People and for the People. 2. The Socialist Republic of Vietnam is run by the people; all state power belongs to the people on the basis of the union between the working class and the peasant class and the contingent of intellectuals. 3. State power means unity, assignment, coordination and control among state agencies in exercising the legislative, executive and judicial powers.
Hiến pháp@3: The State ensures and promotes the People's mastery; recognizes, respects, protects and ensures human rights and citizenship rights; strives to achieve the goal of a prosperous people, a strong, democratic, equitable and civilized country, and a people's well-being, freedom, happiness and conditions for comprehensive development.
Hiến pháp@4: 1. The Communist Party of Vietnam - The pioneer of the working class, the pioneer of the working people and the Vietnamese nation, a loyal representative of the interests of the working class, the working people and the entire nation, which takes Marxism-Leninism and Ho Chi Minh Thought as ideological foundations and is the leading force of the State and society. 2. The Communist Party of Vietnam is closely associated with the people, serves the people, is subject to the people's supervision and is responsible to the people for its decisions. 3. Organizations of the Communist Party of Vietnam and its members shall operate within the framework of the Constitution and law.
Hiến pháp@5: 1. The Socialist Republic of Vietnam is a unified country of all ethnic groups living together in Vietnam. 2. All ethnic groups are equal, unite, respect and help one another to develop; all acts of discrimination and division among the nation are strictly prohibited. 3. The national language is Vietnamese. Ethnic groups have the right to use their spoken and written languages, preserve their national identities and promote their fine customs, practices, traditions and culture. 4. The State shall implement the policy on comprehensive development and create conditions for ethnic minority groups to bring into full play their internal resources for joint development with the country.
Hiến pháp@6: The people exercise the State's powers through direct democracy and representative democracy through the National Assembly, the People's Councils and other State agencies.
Hiến pháp@7: 1. The election of deputies to the National Assembly and People's Councils shall be conducted on the principle of universal suffrage, equality, direct election and secret ballot. 2. Delegates of the National Assembly and People's Council shall be removed from office by electorate or the National Assembly or People's Council when they no longer deserve the confidence of the People.
Hiến pháp@8: 1. The State is organized and operates under the Constitution and law, manages the society by the Constitution and law, and adheres to the principle of democratic centralism. 2. State agencies, cadres, civil servants and public employees must respect the People, devotedly serve the People, closely contact with the People, listen to opinions and submit to the People's supervision; resolutely fight corruption, wastefulness and all manifestations of bureaucracy, imperiousness and authoritarianism.
Hiến pháp@9: 1. Vietnam Fatherland Front is an organization of political alliance, voluntary union of political organizations, socio-political organizations, social organizations and typical individuals of different social classes, ethnic groups, religions and overseas Vietnamese. The Vietnamese Fatherland Front is the political base of the people's government; represents and protects the legitimate rights and interests of the people; gathers and promotes the great national unity, practices democracy and strengthens social consensus; supervises and criticizes society; participates in the construction of the Communist Party and the State, and people's external activities to contribute to the construction and defense of the Fatherland. 2. The Vietnam Trade Union, the Vietnam Peasants' Association, the Ho Chi Minh Communist Youth Union, the Vietnam Women's Union and the Vietnam War Veterans' Association are socio-political organizations set up on the basis of voluntariness, representation and protection of the legitimate and legitimate rights and interests of their members; together with other member organizations of the Front, coordinate and unify their actions in the Vietnam Fatherland Front. 3. Vietnam Fatherland Front, its member organizations and other social organizations operating within the framework of the Constitution and law. The State shall create conditions for the Vietnam Fatherland Front and its member organizations and other social organizations to operate.
Hiến pháp@10: The Vietnam Trade Union is a socio-political organization of the working class and laborers, which is set up on a voluntary basis, represents laborers, cares for and protects the legitimate and legitimate rights and interests of laborers; participates in the State management and socio-economic management; participates in the examination, inspection and supervision of activities of State agencies, organizations, units and enterprises regarding matters related to the rights and obligations of laborers; propagates and mobilizes laborers to study, raise their professional qualifications and skills, observe law, build and defend the Fatherland.
Hiến pháp@11: 1. The Vietnamese Fatherland is sacred and inviolable. 2, All acts of opposing independence, sovereignty, unity and territorial integrity, and opposing the cause of national construction and defense shall be severely punished
Hiến pháp@12: The Socialist Republic of Vietnam consistently implements the foreign policy of independence, self-reliance, peace, friendship, cooperation and development; multilateralizes and diversifies relations, proactively and actively integrates and cooperates internationally on the basis of respect for independence, sovereignty and territorial integrity, non-interference in each other's internal affairs, equality and mutual benefit; complies with the United Nations Charter and treaties to which the Socialist Republic of Vietnam is a contracting party; is a trusted friend, partner and responsible member in the international community for national interests, contributing to the cause of peace, national independence, democracy and social progress in the world.
Hiến pháp@13: 1. The national flag of the Socialist Republic of Vietnam is rectangular, two-thirds wide and red background, with a five-point yellow star in the middle. 2. The national emblem of the Socialist Republic of Vietnam is circular with red background, in the middle of which is a five-pointed yellow star surrounded by rice ears, and half of a cog wheel underneath, and the inscription the Socialist Republic of Vietnam. 3. National anthem of the Socialist Republic of Vietnam means the music and lyrics of the Song of the Army. 4. The National Day of the Socialist Republic of Vietnam means the date of the Declaration of Independence on September 2,1945. 5. Capital of the Socialist Republic of Vietnam is Hanoi.
Hiến pháp@14: 1. In the Socialist Republic of Vietnam, human rights and civil, economic, cultural and social citizenship rights shall be recognized, respected, protected and guaranteed in accordance with the Constitution and law. 2. Human rights and citizenship rights may be restricted under law only in case of necessity for the reasons of national defense and security, social order and safety, social ethics and community health.
Hiến pháp@15: 1. Citizens' rights are not separate from citizens' obligations. 2. Every person has the obligation to respect the rights of others. 3. Citizens shall perform obligations toward the State and society. 4. The exercise of human rights and civil rights must not infringe upon national interests and lawful rights and interests of other persons.
Hiến pháp@16: 1. All persons are equal before law. 2. No one is discriminated against in political, civil, economic, cultural and social life.
Hiến pháp@17: 1. Citizens of the Socialist Republic of Vietnam are those who bear Vietnamese nationality. 2. Vietnamese citizens cannot be expelled or handed over to other State. 3. Vietnamese citizens living abroad shall be protected by the State of the Socialist Republic of Vietnam.
Hiến pháp@18: 1. Overseas Vietnamese constitute an integral part of the Vietnamese ethnic community. 2. The State of the Socialist Republic of Vietnam encourages and creates conditions for overseas Vietnamese to preserve and promote the national cultural identity of Vietnam, maintain close relations with their families and native land, contributing to building their native land and the country.
Hiến pháp@19: Everyone has a right to life. People's lives are protected by law. No one is taken by the General against the law.
Hiến pháp@20: 1. Every person has the right to inviolability of the body, protection of health, honor and dignity by law; no torture, violence, coercion, corporal punishment or any other form of treatment that infringes upon the body, health or offends the honor or dignity. 2. No one shall be arrested without decisions of the People's Courts, decisions or approvals of the People's Procuracies, except for cases of flagrant offense. The arrest, custody and detention of people shall be prescribed by law. 3. All people have the right to donate human tissues and organs and cadavers according to law provisions. The medical, pharmaceutical, scientific or any other form of testing on human bodies must be consented by the tested persons.
Hiến pháp@21: 1. Every person has the inviolable right to privacy, personal secrets and family secrets; the right to protect his/her honor and reputation. Information on private life, personal secrets and family secrets shall be protected by law. 2. Everyone has the right to keep secret mails, telephone, telegraph and other forms of private information exchange. No one is allowed to unlawfully open, control, or seize letters, phone calls, telegrams, and other forms of private information exchange.
Hiến pháp@22: 1. Citizens have the right to have lawful domiciles. 2. Everyone has the inviolable right to residence. No one is allowed to enter the residence of another person without the consent of that person. 3. Search of domiciles shall be prescribed by law.
Hiến pháp@23: Citizens have the right to freedom of movement and residence in the country, the right to travel abroad and return home from abroad. The exercise of these rights shall be provided for by law.
Hiến pháp@24: 1. All persons have the right to freedom of belief and religion, to follow or not to follow any religion. All religions are equal before law. 2. The State respects and protects the right to freedom of belief and religion. 3. No one is allowed to infringe upon the freedom of belief and religion or abuse belief and religion to commit violations of law.
Hiến pháp@25: Citizens have the right to freedom of speech, press, access to information, meetings, associations and protests. The exercise of these rights shall be prescribed by law.
Hiến pháp@26: 1. Male and female citizens are equal in all aspects. The State adopts policies to ensure gender equality rights and opportunities. 2. The State, society and family shall create conditions for women to comprehensively develop and bring into full play their roles in society. 3. Discrimination by gender is strictly prohibited.
Hiến pháp@27: Article 11.-Citizens aged full eighteen years or older shall have the right to vote and citizens aged full twenty one years or older shall have the right to stand for election to the National Assembly or the People's Councils. The exercise of these rights shall be prescribed by law.
Hiến pháp@28: 1. Citizens have the right to participate in the State and social management, to participate in discussions and proposals with State agencies on issues at the grassroots, localities and throughout the country. 2. The State shall create conditions for citizens to participate in state and social management; and make public and transparent the receipt and response to citizens' opinions and proposals.
Hiến pháp@29: Citizens aged eighteen years or older shall have the right to vote when the State holds a referendum.
Hiến pháp@30: 1. All people have the right to complain and denounce to competent agencies, organizations and/or individuals illegal acts of such agencies, organizations and/or individuals. 2. Competent agencies, organizations and individuals shall receive and settle complaints and denunciations. Persons suffering damage are entitled to material and spiritual compensation and honor restoration according to law. 3. It is strictly forbidden to take revenge on complainants and/or denouncers or to abuse the right to complain and/or denounce to slander or to harm other persons.
Hiến pháp@31: 1. Accused persons shall be deemed not guilty until they are proved guilty in accordance with the law and a court's sentence of guilt has taken effect. 2. Accused persons must be promptly tried by courts within a time limit prescribed by law in a fair and public manner. In case of behind-closed-door trial prescribed by law, judgment pronouncement must be public. 3, No one is ever convicted twice of a crime 4. Persons arrested, held in custody, detained, charged, investigated, prosecuted or tried may defend themselves or ask lawyers or other persons to defend them. 5. Persons who are arrested, held in custody, detained, charged, investigated, prosecuted, tried or executed illegally shall have the right to receive compensation for material and spiritual damage and restore their honor. Those who commit law-breaking acts in the arrest, custody, prosecution, investigation, prosecution, trial or execution of judgments, thus causing damage to other persons, shall be handled according to law.
Hiến pháp@32: 1. Everyone has the right to own lawful incomes, savings, dwelling houses, means of daily life and production, capital contributions in enterprises or other economic organizations. 2. The private ownership and the right to inheritance shall be protected by law. 3. In case of extreme necessity for reasons of national defense and security or national interests, state of emergency, natural disaster prevention and combat, the State shall compulsorily purchase or requisition property of organizations and individuals with compensation at market prices.
Hiến pháp@33: People have the freedom to do business in professions not prohibited by law.
Hiến pháp@34: Citizens have the right to social security.
Hiến pháp@35: 1. Citizens have the right to work, select professions, jobs and workplaces. 2. Wage earners shall be provided with fair and safe working conditions; and enjoy salaries and rest. 3. Discrimination, forced labor and employment of employees under the minimum working age are strictly prohibited.
Hiến pháp@36: 1. Men and women have the right to marry and divorce. Marriage is on the principle of voluntariness, progress, monogamy, equality and mutual respect. 2. The State protects marriage and family, and protects the interests of mothers and children.
Hiến pháp@37: 1. Children shall be protected, cared for and educated by the State, families and society; and may participate in issues involving children. It is strictly prohibited to abuse, persecute, mistreat, neglect, abuse or exploit the labor of, and commit other acts in violation of, children's rights. 2. The State, families and society shall create conditions for youth to study, work, entertain, develop their physical strength and intellect, foster their morality, national traditions and civic sense; and take the lead in the cause of creative labor and national defense. 3. The elderly shall be respected, cared for and promoted by the State, families and society in the cause of national construction and defense.
Hiến pháp@38: 1. All acts threatening the life and health of other people and the community are strictly prohibited.
Hiến pháp@39: Article 11.-Citizens have the right and obligation to study.
Hiến pháp@40: People have the right to study science and technology, create literature and art and enjoy benefits from such activities.
Hiến pháp@41: Article 10.-People have the right to enjoy and access cultural values, to participate in cultural life and use cultural establishments.
Hiến pháp@42: Citizens have the right to determine their ethnicity, use their native language and choose the language of communication.
Hiến pháp@43: Everyone has the right to live in a clean environment and has the duty to protect the environment.
Hiến pháp@44: Citizens have the duty to be loyal to the Fatherland. Betraying your country is the most serious crime.
Hiến pháp@45: 1. The protection of the Homeland is a sacred duty and a noble right of citizens. 2. Citizens shall perform military service and participate in building the all-people national defense.
Hiến pháp@46: The citizen is obliged to obey the Constitution and the law; to take part in the protection of national security, social order and safety and to observe the rules of public life.
Hiến pháp@47: People are obliged to pay taxes as prescribed by law.
Hiến pháp@48: Article 10.-Foreigners residing in Vietnam must abide by the Constitution and laws of Vietnam; and be protected by the Vietnamese law for their lives, properties, legitimate rights and interests.
Hiến pháp@49: Foreigners who are persecuted for their freedom and national independence, for socialism, democracy and peace or for scientific causes shall be considered by the State of the Socialist Republic of Vietnam for residence.
Hiến pháp@50: The Socialist Republic of Vietnam shall build an independent and autonomous economy, promote internal resources, integrate and cooperate internationally, closely associate with cultural development, social progress and equality, environmental protection, and national industrialization and modernization.
Hiến pháp@51: 1. The Vietnamese economy is a socialist-oriented market economy with many forms of ownership and economic sectors; the state economy plays the leading role. 2. Economic sectors are all important components of the national economy. Subjects of economic sectors are equal, cooperative and competitive under law. 3. The State encourages and creates favorable conditions for businesspeople, enterprises and other individuals and organizations to invest, produce and do business; sustainably develop economic sectors and contribute to national construction. Legitimate property of individuals and organizations investing, producing and doing business shall be protected by law and not nationalized.
Hiến pháp@52: The State shall build and perfect economic institutions, regulate the economy on the basis of respect for market rules; perform the assignment, decentralization and decentralization of state management; promote regional economic linkage, ensuring the unity of the national economy.
Hiến pháp@53: Land, water resources, mineral resources, resources in sea areas, airspace, other natural resources and property invested and managed by the State are public property under the ownership of the entire people and under the unified management of the State as the owner's representative.
Hiến pháp@54: 1. Land is a special national resource and an important resource for national development and is managed in accordance with law. 2. Organizations and individuals shall be assigned or leased land by the State, have their land use rights recognized. Land users may transfer the land use rights and exercise the rights and perform the obligations prescribed by law. The land use rights shall be protected by law. 3. The State shall recover land currently used by organizations and individuals in really necessary cases as prescribed by law for defense and security purposes; socio-economic development in the national and public interests. The land recovery must be public and transparent and compensation therefor must be made according to law provisions. 4. The State shall requisition land in case of extreme necessity as prescribed by law for the performance of defense or security tasks or in the state of war or emergency, or for natural disaster prevention and control.
Hiến pháp@55: 1. State budget, national reserve, state financial fund and other public financial sources shall be uniformly managed by the State and used in an effective, fair, transparent and lawful manner. 2. The State budget consists of central budget and local budget, of which the central budget plays the leading role, ensuring the national expenditure tasks. The State budget revenues and expenditures must be estimated and prescribed by law. 3. The national currency is Vietnam dong. The State ensures the stability of the national currency.
