Where there is no agreement or the agreement is not clear on the price and payment method, the price shall be determined according to the market price and the payment method shall be determined according to the customary practice at the place and time of concluding the contract.
Bộ luật dân sự@434: The term of the purchase and sale contract 1. The time limit for performance of a purchase and sale contract shall be agreed upon by the parties. The seller shall have to hand over the property to the purchaser on the agreed time limit; the seller may hand over the property before or after the time limit if so agreed upon by the purchaser. 2. Where the parties fail to agree on the time limit for delivery of property, the purchaser may request the seller to deliver the property and the seller may request the purchaser to receive the property at any time, provided that reasonable prior notice is given to each other. 3. The purchaser shall make payment for the purchase within the agreed time limit. If the payment time limit is not determined or is unclear, the purchaser shall make payment right at the time of receiving the purchased property or the property ownership certificate.
Bộ luật dân sự@435: Location of delivery The place of delivery of property shall be agreed upon by the parties; if there is no agreement, the provisions of Clause 2, Article 277 of this Code shall apply.
Bộ luật dân sự@436: Method of delivery of property 1. Property shall be delivered by the mode agreed upon by the parties; if there is no agreement, the property shall be delivered by the seller in lump sum and directly to the purchaser. 2. Where the seller has delivered the property to the purchaser in multiple times but the seller has failed to fulfill its obligations in a given time, the purchaser may cancel the part of the contract related to such violation and demand compensation for damage.
Bộ luật dân sự@437: Liability for delivery of property in an improper quantity 1. Where the seller delivers the property in a quantity greater than the agreed quantity, the purchaser may receive or not receive the excess; if receiving, the excess must be paid at the price agreed upon in the contract, unless otherwise agreed. 2. Where the seller delivers less than the agreed quantity, the purchaser has one of the following rights: a) Receive the delivered part and set a time limit for the seller to transfer the deficit; b/To receive the assigned part and claim compensation for damage; c) Cancel the contract and claim compensation for damage if the violation makes the buyer unable to achieve the purpose of entering into the contract.
Bộ luật dân sự@438: Liability for delivery of an asynchronous object 1. Where an object is delivered in incomplete form, thus making its use purpose unachievable, the purchaser has one of the following rights: a) Receive and request the seller to transfer the missing part or part, claim compensation for damage and delay the payment for the part or part received until the object is delivered in complete sets; b) Cancel the contract and claim compensation for damage. 2. If the purchaser has paid but has not received the items due to the incomplete delivery, the purchaser shall be paid interest on the paid amount at the interest rate agreed upon between the parties but not exceeding the interest rate specified in Clause 1, Article 468 of this Code; if there is no agreement, Clause 2, Article 468 of this Code shall apply and the seller shall be requested to pay compensation for damage caused by the incomplete delivery of the items from the time the contract is required to be performed until the items are delivered in complete sets.
Bộ luật dân sự@439: Liability to deliver property of improper type Where the property is delivered of a wrong type, the purchaser has one of the following rights: 1. Receive and pay at the prices agreed upon by the parties; 2. To request the hand-over of property of the right categories and compensation for damage; 3. To cancel the contract and claim compensation for damage if the delivery of goods of improper types prevents the purchaser from achieving the purpose of entering into the contract. If the seller fails to deliver the property in accordance with the agreement on one or some types of property, the buyer may cancel the part of the contract related to such type of property and demand compensation for damage.
Bộ luật dân sự@440: Obligation to pay 1. The purchaser shall be obliged to make payment within the time limit, at the place and at the amount specified in the contract. 2. Where the parties only agree on the time limit for delivery of the property, the time limit for payment shall also be determined in proportion to the time limit for delivery of the property. If the parties do not agree on the time limit for delivery of the property and the time limit for payment, the purchaser must make payment at the time of receipt of the property. 3. If the purchaser fails to fulfill the obligation to pay the money, the purchaser must pay interest on the late payment as prescribed in Article 357 of this Code.
Bộ luật dân sự@441: Risk taking time 1. The seller shall bear all risks of the property before it is delivered to the purchaser, and the purchaser shall bear all risks of the property from the time of receiving the property, unless otherwise agreed or otherwise provided for by law. 2. For property purchase and sale contracts for which ownership must be registered under law, the seller shall bear the risks until the registration procedures are completed and the purchaser shall bear the risks from the time the registration procedures are completed, unless otherwise agreed upon.
Bộ luật dân sự@442: Shipping costs and costs related to transfer of ownership 1. Transport costs and costs related to the transfer of ownership rights shall be agreed upon by the parties, unless otherwise provided by law. 2. In case the parties have no agreement or have an unclear agreement, freight and expenses related to the transfer of ownership rights shall be determined according to the announced freight, regulations of competent agencies or professional standards. 3. In case there is no basis for determination under Clauses 1 and 2 of this Article, transportation costs and expenses related to the transfer of ownership rights shall be determined according to common standards or specific standards suitable to the purpose of concluding contracts. 4. In case the parties have no agreement and the law does not provide for transportation costs and expenses related to the transfer of ownership rights, the seller shall bear transportation costs to the place of delivery of the property and expenses related to the transfer of ownership rights.
Bộ luật dân sự@443: The obligation to provide information and instructions on the use of the forest products The seller shall be obliged to provide the purchaser with necessary information on the property and instructions on how to use such property. If the seller fails to perform this obligation, the purchaser may request the seller to perform this obligation within a reasonable time limit. If the seller still fails to perform this obligation, thus making the purchaser unable to achieve the purpose of entering into the contract, the purchaser may cancel the contract and claim compensation for damage.
Bộ luật dân sự@444: Guarantees for the purchaser's ownership of the purchased property 1. The seller is obliged to ensure that the ownership of property sold to the buyer is not disputed by a third party. 2. Where the property is disputed by a third party, the seller must stand with the purchaser to protect the interests of the purchaser; if the third party has the right to own part or the whole of the property, the purchaser has the right to cancel the contract and request the seller to pay compensation for damage. 3. Where a purchaser knows or should know that the property being sold and purchased is under the ownership of a third person but still purchases it, he/she must return the property to the owner and shall not be entitled to claim compensation for damage.
Bộ luật dân sự@445: Ensuring the quality of objects for sale and purchase 1. The seller must ensure the use value or characteristics of the object for sale and purchase; if after the purchase the purchaser detects a defect which degrades or reduces the use value of the purchased object, he/she/it shall immediately notify the seller thereof when detecting such defect and may request the seller to repair, exchange the defective object for another object, reduce the price and pay compensation for damage, unless otherwise agreed upon. 2. The seller must ensure that the object for sale conforms with the description on the package, the goods label or conforms with the sample selected by the purchaser. 3. The seller shall not be liable for the defect of the object in the following cases: a) The defect is known or must be known by the purchaser when purchasing; b/Objects for auction or objects sold at second-hand shops; c) The purchaser is at fault for causing defects in the object.
Bộ luật dân sự@446: Warranty obligation The seller shall be obliged to provide warranty for the object for a period of time, called the warranty period, if the warranty is agreed upon by the parties or provided for by law. The warranty duration shall be counted from the time the purchaser is obliged to receive the object.
Bộ luật dân sự@447: Right to request warranty During the warranty period, if the purchaser detects any defects in the object, he/she may request the seller to repair the object without having to pay for it, to discount the price, to exchange the defective object for another object or to return the object and receive back the money.
Bộ luật dân sự@448: Repairs to objects within warranty period 1. The seller must repair the object and ensure that the object satisfies all quality standards or the committed characteristics. 2. The seller shall bear the costs of repair and transportation of the object to the place of repair and from the place of repair to the place of residence or head office of the purchaser. 3. The purchaser may request the seller to complete the repair within a time limit agreed upon by the parties or within a reasonable period of time; if the seller is unable to repair or to complete the repair within such time limit, the purchaser may request a price reduction, exchange of the defective object for another object or return the object and get back the money.
Bộ luật dân sự@449: - Compensate for damage within the warranty period. 1. Apart from the request for the application of warranty measures, the purchaser may request the seller to pay compensation for damage caused by technical defects of the object during the warranty period. 2. The seller shall not be liable for compensation for damage if it is proved that the damage is caused by the buyer's fault. The seller shall be reduced the compensation level if the buyer fails to apply necessary measures within its capacity to prevent and limit damage.
Bộ luật dân sự@450: Property rights trade 1. In case of purchase and sale of property rights, the seller shall transfer documents and carry out procedures for transfer of ownership rights to the purchaser and the purchaser shall pay a sum of money to the seller. 2. Where the property right is the right to claim debts and the seller commits to ensure the solvency of the debtor, the seller shall be jointly liable for the payment if the debtor fails to pay upon the due date. 3. The time of transfer of ownership over property rights is the time when the purchaser receives papers on ownership over such property rights or from the time of registration of ownership transfer, if so provided for by law.
Bộ luật dân sự@451: Property auction Property may be put up for auction at the will of owners or according to the provisions of law. The auction of property under common ownership must be agreed upon by all co-owners, except otherwise agreed upon or provided for by law. The property auction must ensure the principles of objectivity, publicity and transparency, assurance of lawful rights and interests of involved parties and comply with the law on property auction.
Bộ luật dân sự@452: Buy after trial use 1. The parties may agree that the purchaser may try to use the purchased object for a period of time, called the trial use duration. During the trial use duration, the purchaser may reply to the purchaser whether or not to buy the object; if past the trial use duration the purchaser still fails to reply, the purchaser shall be deemed to have accepted the purchase under the agreed conditions before receiving the object for trial use. In case the parties do not agree or reach an unclear agreement on the trial use duration, this duration shall be determined according to the custom of transactions involving objects of the same type. 2. During the trial use duration, the object is still under the seller's ownership. The seller shall bear all risks related to the object, unless otherwise agreed upon. During the trial use duration, the seller may not sell, donate, lease, exchange, mortgage or pledge the property until the purchaser gives a reply. 3. In case the trial user replies that it does not buy the test object, it shall return the object to the seller and pay compensation for damage caused to the seller if it loses or damages the test object. The trial user shall not be liable for ordinary wear and tear caused by the trial use and shall not have to return the yield brought about by the trial use.
Bộ luật dân sự@453: Buy on a deferred, installment basis 1. The parties may agree that the purchaser shall make deferred or installment payment for the purchase within a time limit after receiving the purchased property. The seller may reserve the ownership over the sold property until the purchaser fully pays the money, unless otherwise agreed. 2. Contracts on purchase by deferred payment or installment payment must be made in writing. The purchasers may use the properties purchased by deferred payment or installment payment and must bear risks in the use duration, except otherwise agreed upon.
Bộ luật dân sự@454: Redeem the property you sold. 1. The seller may agree with the purchaser on the right to redeem the property sold after a time limit called the redemption time limit. The time limit for property redemption shall be agreed upon by the parties; in case of no agreement, the time limit for property redemption must not exceed one year, for movable property, or five years, for immovable property, counting from the time of delivery of the property, unless otherwise provided for by relevant laws. Within this time limit, the seller may redeem the property at any time but shall give reasonable prior notice to the purchaser. The redemption price is the market price at the time and place of redemption, unless otherwise agreed upon. 2. During the redemption period, the purchaser may not enter into a transaction of transfer of ownership of the property to another entity and shall bear all risks related to the property, unless otherwise agreed.
Bộ luật dân sự@455: Contract for exchange of assets 1. Asset exchange contract means an agreement between parties whereby the parties hand over assets and transfer the ownership over such assets to each other. 2. The property exchange contract must be made in writing, notarized, certified or registered, if so provided for by law. 3. Where a party exchanging property not under its ownership or without authorization from the owner, the other party has the right to cancel the contract and demand compensation for damage. 4. Each party shall be deemed to be the seller of the property delivered to the other party and the purchaser of the property received. The provisions of Articles 430 to 439,441 to 449 and 454 of this Code shall also apply to property exchange contracts.
Bộ luật dân sự@456: Settlement of difference value Where the exchanged property has a value difference, the parties shall have to pay that difference to each other, except otherwise agreed upon or provided for by law.
Bộ luật dân sự@457: Contract for property donation Contract for property donation means an agreement between parties whereby the giver delivers his/her/its property and transfers ownership to the donee without claiming compensation and the donee agrees to receive the property.
Bộ luật dân sự@458: - Gifts for movable property 1. A contract for gift of movable property shall take effect from the time the donee receives the property, unless otherwise agreed. 2. For movable property for which ownership is registered under law, the donation contract takes effect from the time of registration.
Bộ luật dân sự@459: - Real estate gifts 1. The gift of immoveable property must be recorded in writing, notarized or certified, or must be registered, if the ownership of immoveable property must be registered as prescribed by law. 2. A contract on donation of immovable property shall take effect as from the time of registration; if immovable property is not subject to ownership registration, the donation contract shall take effect as from the time of transfer of the property.
Bộ luật dân sự@460: Liability for intentionally giving property not under one's ownership Where a giver intentionally gives away property not under his/her ownership and the recipient does not know or cannot know of such giving, the giver must pay the costs of increasing the value of the property to the recipient when the owner takes back the property.
Bộ luật dân sự@461: Notice of impairment of donated property The giver shall be obliged to notify the recipient of defects of the gift. If the giver knows that the gift has defects but fails to notify the recipient, he/she shall be liable for compensation for damage caused to the recipient; if the giver does not know of defects of the gift, he/she shall not be liable for compensation for damage.
Bộ luật dân sự@462: Conditional gifts of property 1. The giver may request the recipient to perform one or more than one obligation before or after the donation. The conditions for donation must not violate the prohibitions of law and must not contravene social ethics. 2. In case an obligation must be performed before the donation, if the donee has fulfilled the obligation but the giver fails to deliver the property, the giver shall pay for the obligation performed by the donee. 3. In case the recipient fails to fulfill his/her obligations after the donation, the giver may reclaim the property and claim compensation for damage.
Bộ luật dân sự@463: Property loan agreement Contract for borrowing property means an agreement between parties whereby the lender delivers property to the borrower; when the payment is due, the borrower shall have to return to the lender the property of the same type in strict accordance with the prescribed quantity and quality and shall only have to pay interests if so agreed upon or provided for by law.
Bộ luật dân sự@464: Ownership of borrowed property The borrower becomes the owner of the borrowed property from the time of receiving such property.
Bộ luật dân sự@465: Obligations of the lender 1. To deliver the property to the borrower in full, with the right quality and quantity at the time and place as agreed upon. 2. To pay compensation to the borrower if the lender knows that the property is not up to quality without notifying the borrower thereof, except where the borrower still receives such property after knowing it. 3. Not to request the borrower to return the property ahead of time, unless otherwise provided for in Article 470 of this Code or relevant laws.
Bộ luật dân sự@466: The borrower's obligation to pay debts 1. The borrower of property being money shall have to fully pay the money when it is due; if the property is an object, it shall have to pay the object of the same type in the right quantity and quality, except otherwise agreed upon. 2. Where the borrower cannot repay the object, it may repay in cash the value of the borrowed object at the place and time of debt repayment, if so agreed upon by the lender. 3. The place of debt repayment shall be the place of residence or head office of the lender, unless otherwise agreed upon. 4. Where an interest-free loan is due but the borrower fails to repay or fully repay the debt, the lender may request the payment of interest at the rate prescribed in Clause 2, Article 468 of this Code on the late payment amount corresponding to the late payment duration, unless otherwise agreed or otherwise provided for by law. 5. In case of interest-bearing loan, if the borrower fails to pay or fully pay the due loan, the borrower must pay interest as follows: - The borrower shall pay the loan interest as prescribed in Clause 1 Article 2 of this Circular. a) The interest on the principal shall be calculated at the agreed interest rate in the loan contract corresponding to the loan term that has not been paid due; in case of late payment, the interest rate prescribed in Clause 2 Article 468 of this Code shall be also applied; b/The interest on the overdue principal is equal to 150% of the contractual loan interest rate corresponding to the late payment period, unless otherwise agreed upon.
Bộ luật dân sự@467: Use of borrowed property The parties may agree that the borrowed property must be used for the right purposes. The lender may inspect the use of the property and may reclaim the borrowed property ahead of time if, after giving a warning, the borrower still uses the property for the wrong purposes.
Bộ luật dân sự@468: Interest Rate 1. The loan interest rate shall be agreed upon by the parties. If the parties agree on the interest rate, the agreed interest rate must not exceed 20% / year of the loan, unless otherwise prescribed by relevant laws. According to the reality and the proposal of the Government, the Standing Committee of National Assembly shall decide to adjust the abovementioned interest rate and submit a report to the National Assembly at the nearest meeting. If the agreed interest rate exceeds the limit on interest rate prescribed in this Clause, the exceeding interest rate shall be invalidated. 2. Where the parties have agreed on the payment of interests but fail to clearly determine the interest rates and there is a dispute over the interest rates, the interest rates shall be determined as equal to 50% of the limit interest rates prescribed in Clause 1 of this Article at the time of debt repayment.
Bộ luật dân sự@469: Performance of indefinite-term loan contracts 1. For contracts on demand and interest-free loans, the lenders may reclaim the properties and the borrowers may repay the debts at any time, but must notify each other thereof in reasonable time in advance, except otherwise agreed upon. 2. For contracts on demand and interest-bearing loans, the lenders may reclaim the properties at any time, but must notify the borrowers thereof in advance for a reasonable period of time and be paid the interests thereon till the time of receiving the properties, while the borrowers may return the properties at any time and must only pay the interests till the time of debt repayment, but must also notify the lenders thereof in advance for a reasonable period of time.
Bộ luật dân sự@470: Performance of a term loan contract 1. For contracts on time-based and interest-free loans, the borrowers may return their properties at any time, provided that they have to notify the lenders thereof in advance for a reasonable period of time, while the lenders may reclaim the properties before the time limit, if so agreed upon by the borrowers. 2. For contracts on time and interest-bearing loans, the borrowers may return the properties ahead of time, but must pay the entire interests thereon, except otherwise agreed upon or otherwise provided for by law.
Bộ luật dân sự@471: They, humped, biêu, ward... 1. tontine means a form of customary property transaction on the basis of agreement between a group of people who gather together to determine the number of people, time, money or other property, mode of annuity contribution and receipt, and rights and obligations of members. 2. Tontine for mutual assistance purposes among people shall be organized in accordance with law. 3. If the tontine is profitable, the interest rate shall comply with this Code. 4. It is strictly forbidden to organize tontine in the form of usury.
Bộ luật dân sự@472: Property lease agreement A property lease contract is an agreement between parties whereby the lessor delivers property to the lessee for use for a certain period of time and the lessee must pay the rent. The lease contract and lease contract for other purposes shall comply with this Code, the Law on Housing and relevant regulations of law.
Bộ luật dân sự@473: Rent 1. The rent shall be agreed upon by the parties or determined by a third party at the request of the parties, except otherwise provided for by law. 2. In case there is no agreement or the agreement is not clear, the rental shall be determined according to the market price at the place and time of concluding the lease contract.
Bộ luật dân sự@474: Lease term 1. The leasing term shall be agreed upon by the parties; if there is no agreement thereon, it shall be determined according to the leasing purposes. 2. Where the parties fail to agree on the leasing term and the leasing term cannot be determined according to the leasing purposes, each party may terminate the contract at any time, but must notify the other party thereof a reasonable time in advance.
Bộ luật dân sự@475: Re-lease The lessee may sublease the property which he/she has leased, if so agreed by the lessor.
Bộ luật dân sự@476: Transfer of leased assets 1. The lessor must hand over the property to the lessee with the right quantity, quality, type, condition, time and place as agreed and provide necessary information on the use of such property. 2. Where the lessor is late in delivering the property, the lessee may extend the time limit for delivery of the property or cancel the contract and demand compensation for damage; if the leased property is of inferior quality as agreed upon, the lessee may request the lessor to repair it, reduce the rent or cancel the contract and demand compensation for damage.
Bộ luật dân sự@477: Obligation to ensure the use value of leased assets 1. The lessor must ensure that the leased property is in the agreed state and in conformity with the leasing purpose throughout the leasing term; repair damage and defects of the leased property, except for minor damage which, according to custom, the lessee must repair by itself. 2. Where the leased property is reduced in use value not due to the lessee's fault, the lessee may request the lessor to apply one or several of the following measures: a) Repair the property; b) Reduction of rent; c/To exchange other property or unilaterally terminate the performance of the contract and claim compensation for damage, if the leased property has defects which the lessee does not know of or the leased property is irreparable, thus failing to achieve the lease purpose. 3. Where the lessor has been notified of failure to repair or to repair the leased property in a timely manner, the lessee shall be entitled to repair the leased property by himself/herself at reasonable expenses, but shall have to notify the lessor thereof and may request the lessor to pay the repair costs.
Bộ luật dân sự@478: Obligation to secure the right to use the property for the lessee 1. The lessor must ensure the stable right to use the property to the lessee. 2. In case of a dispute over the ownership of a leased asset, if the lessee is not allowed to use the asset stably, the lessee may unilaterally terminate the performance of the contract and claim compensation for damage.
Bộ luật dân sự@479: Obligation to preserve leased property 1. The lessee must preserve the leased property, maintain and repair it in minor manner; if losing or damaging it, the lessee must compensate for any loss or damage. The lessee shall not be liable for natural wear and tear caused by the use of the leased property. 2. The lessee may repair and increase the value of the leased property if so agreed by the lessor and may request the lessor to pay reasonable expenses.
Bộ luật dân sự@480: Obligation to use leased property for proper purposes 1. The lessee must use the leased property strictly according to its utility and the agreed purpose. 2. Where the lessee uses the property for improper purposes or purposes other than the agreed purpose, the lessor shall have the right to unilaterally terminate the performance of the contract and demand compensation for any loss or damage.
Bộ luật dân sự@481: Payment of rent 1. The lessee must pay the rent in full and on time as agreed upon; if there is no agreement on the time limit for payment of rent, the time limit for payment of rent shall be determined according to the custom of the place of payment; if the custom-based time limit cannot be determined, the lessee shall have to pay the rent upon returning the leased property. 2. Where the parties agree to pay the rent according to the set time limit, the lessor may unilaterally terminate the performance of the contract if the lessee fails to pay the rent for three consecutive periods, unless otherwise agreed upon or otherwise provided for by law.
Bộ luật dân sự@482: Return of leased assets 1. The lessee must return the leased property in the same condition as when receiving it, minus natural wear and tear or in the same condition as agreed; if the value of the leased property is reduced as compared with the condition when receiving it, the lessor may claim compensation for damage, minus natural wear and tear. 2. Where the leased property is movables, the place for returning the leased property shall be the place of residence or head office of the lessor, unless otherwise agreed upon. 3. Where the leased property is cattle, the lessee shall have to return the leased cattle and the cattle born during the lease term, except otherwise agreed upon. The lessor shall have to pay the costs of caring for the born cattle to the lessee. 4. When the lessee is late in returning the leased asset, the lessor may request the lessee to return the leased asset, pay the rent during the late payment period and pay compensation for damage; the lessee shall pay a fine for the late return of the leased asset, if so agreed upon. 5. The lessee must bear the risks of the leased property during the late payment period. Subsection 2 ASSET LEASE CONTRACTS
Bộ luật dân sự@483: Property package lease agreement A contract for thue khoan of property is an agreement between parties whereby the thue khoan lessor delivers the property to the thue khoan lessee for the purpose of exploiting its utility and enjoying the yield and income derived from the thue khoan property, and the thue khoan lessee is obliged to pay the rent.
Bộ luật dân sự@484: Subject matter of a thue khoan contract The objects of a package lease contract may be unexploited land, forests, water surface, cattle, production and/or business establishments, other production means and equipment necessary for the exploitation of their utility and for the enjoyment of yields and/or profits, except otherwise provided for by law.
Bộ luật dân sự@485: - The term of the package lease. The term of a thue khoan shall be agreed upon by the parties. Where there is no agreement or there is an unclear agreement, the term of thue khoan shall be determined according to the production and business cycle in conformity with the nature of the thue khoan subject matter.
Bộ luật dân sự@486: - The package rent rate; The package leasing price shall be agreed upon by the parties; if the package leasing is effected through bidding, the package leasing price shall be determined according to the bidding results.
Bộ luật dân sự@487: Delivery of thue khoan property Upon delivery of a thue khoan property, the parties shall make a record assessing the condition of the thue khoan property and determining the value of the thue khoan property. In case the parties cannot determine the value, they shall invite a third party to determine the value and such valuation must be made in writing.
Bộ luật dân sự@488: Payment of flat rent and method of payment 1. Thue khoan tiền thuê có thể được trả bằng hiện vật, tiền hoặc bằng việc làm một công việc. 2. A thue khoan lessee must pay the thue khoan rent in full even if he/she does not exploit the utility of the thue khoan property. 3. When entering into a thue khoan contract, the parties may agree on the conditions for the reduction of the thue khoan rent; if the yield or income is lost at least one third due to force majeure events, the thue khoan lessee may request the reduction or exemption of the thue khoan rent, unless otherwise agreed. 4. Where a thue khoan lessee must pay in kind in seasonal or cycle-based manner, the thue khoan lessee must pay at the end of the thue khoan or cycle-based manner, unless otherwise agreed. 5. Where a thue khoan lessee must perform an act, such act must be performed. 6. The time limit for paying a thue khoan shall be agreed upon by the parties. If the parties have no agreement, the thue khoan lessee shall pay on the last day of each month. In case the thue khoan is paid according to a production or business cycle, the thue khoan lessee shall pay no later than the end of such production or business cycle.
Bộ luật dân sự@489: OPERATION OF DEPOSIT-LEVEL ASSETS A thue khoan lessee must exploit thue khoan property for the right purpose as agreed and must periodically report to the thue khoan lessee on the condition and the status of the property. If the thue khoan lessor requests or needs to make an unexpected report, the thue khoan lessee must promptly report. If the thue khoan lessee does not exploit thue khoan property for the right purpose, the thue khoan lessor has the right to terminate unilaterally the performance of the contract and demand compensation for damage.
Bộ luật dân sự@490: Preservation, maintenance and disposal of fixed assets 1. During the term of operation of a thue khoan property, the thue khoan lessee must maintain and maintain the thue khoan property and its accompanying equipment at its own expense, unless otherwise agreed. If the thue khoan lessee loses, damages, or devaluates or reduces the value of, the thue khoan property, the thue khoan lessee must compensate for damage. The thue khoan lessee shall not be liable for natural wear and tear caused by the use of the thue khoan property. 2. A thue khoan lessee may repair or renovate the thue khoan property by itself if so agreed and must preserve the value of the thue khoan property. The thue khoan lessor shall pay the thue khoan lessee reasonable expenses for repair and renovation of the thue khoan property as agreed. 3. A thue khoan lessee shall not be entitled to sub-lease a thue khoan lease, unless otherwise agreed by the thue khoan lessor.
Bộ luật dân sự@491: Yield, losses on the farmed cattle During the term of the thue khoan of cattle, the thue khoan lessee shall be entitled to half of the number of the offspring and shall be liable for half of the damage caused to the thue khoan cattle by force majeure events, unless otherwise agreed.
Bộ luật dân sự@492: Unilateral termination of performance of a thue khoan contract 1. In cases where one party unilaterally terminates the contract performance, it must notify the other party thereof in a reasonable time in advance; if the package hiring is made according to seasons or exploitation cycles, the time limit for advance notice must be compatible with such seasons or exploitation cycles. 2. Where a thue khoan lessee breaches its obligations and the exploitation of the thue khoan object is the sole means of livelihood of the thue khoan lessee and the continuation of the thue khoan lease does not seriously affect the interests of the thue khoan lessor, the thue khoan lessor shall not be allowed to unilaterally terminate the performance of the contract; the thue khoan lessee must commit to the thue khoan lessor not to continue to breach the contract.
Bộ luật dân sự@493: Return of thue khoan property Upon termination of a thue khoan contract, the thue khoan lessee must return the thue khoan property in a condition consistent with the agreed depreciation rate; if the thue khoan property is devalued or deteriorated, the lessee must compensate for any damage.
Bộ luật dân sự@494: Contract for borrowing property Contract for borrowing property means an agreement between parties whereby the lender delivers property to the borrower for use for a period of time without having to pay the loan, and the borrower must return such property upon the expiry of the loan term or the purpose of the loan has been achieved.
Bộ luật dân sự@495: Subject matter of a contract for borrowing property All non-consumable assets can be subject to a loan agreement.
Bộ luật dân sự@496: Obligations of the borrower 1. To preserve and preserve the borrowed property, not to change the property's state at their own will; if the property is normally damaged, it must be repaired. 2. Not to re-lend to other persons without the consent of the lender. 3. To return the borrowed property on time; if there is no agreement on the time limit for return of the property, the borrower shall return the property immediately after the borrowing purpose has been achieved. 4. Compensate for any loss or damage to the borrowed property. 5. The borrower must bear the risks of the borrowed property during the late payment period.
Bộ luật dân sự@497: Rights of the borrower 1. To use the borrowed property strictly according to its utility and the agreed purpose. 2. To request the lender to pay reasonable expenses for the repair or increase of the value of the borrowed property, if so agreed upon. 3. Not to be responsible for the natural wear and tear of the borrowed property.
Bộ luật dân sự@498: Obligations of the lender 1. Provide necessary information about the use of property and its defects, if any. 2. To pay to the borrower repair expenses and expenses which increase the value of the property, if so agreed upon. 3. Compensate the borrower for damage if the borrower knows that the property has defects but fails to inform the borrower, causing damage to the borrower, except for defects known or supposed to be known by the borrower.
Bộ luật dân sự@499: Rights of the lender 1. To reclaim the property immediately after the borrower has achieved the purpose if there is no agreement on the borrowing term; if the lender has an unexpected and urgent need to use the borrowed property, he/she may reclaim such property even though the borrower has not yet achieved the purpose, provided that he/she gives reasonable prior notice. 2. Reclaim the property when the borrower uses it for improper purposes or in improper ways as agreed or re-lends it to another person without the lender's consent. 3. To claim compensation for damage caused to the property by the borrower.
Bộ luật dân sự@500: Contract on land use rights Land use right contract means an agreement between parties whereby a land user exchanges, transfers, leases, subleases, presents, mortgages or contributes as capital land use rights or exercises other rights under the Land Law for the other party; the other party exercises rights and performs obligations under the contract with the land user.
Bộ luật dân sự@501: Contents of a land use right contract 1. The general provisions on contracts and contents of common contracts in this Code shall also apply to contracts on land use rights, unless otherwise provided for by law. 2. The contents of the land use right contract must not contravene the regulations on the land use purposes, land use duration, land use plannings and plans as well as other rights and obligations prescribed by the land legislation and other relevant law provisions.
Bộ luật dân sự@502: Form and procedures for performance of land use rights contracts 1. A contract for land use rights must be made in writing in a form consistent with this Code, the law on land and other relevant laws. 2. The performance of land use right contracts must strictly comply with the order and procedures prescribed by the land law and other relevant provisions of law.
Bộ luật dân sự@503: Effect of land use right transfer The transfer of land use rights takes effect from the time of registration under the Land Law.
Bộ luật dân sự@504: Cooperation Contract 1. Cooperation contract means an agreement between individuals and legal entities on the joint contribution of property and labor to perform certain jobs, to enjoy benefits and to bear joint responsibility. 2. Cooperation contracts must be made in writing.
Bộ luật dân sự@505: Contents of cooperation contract A cooperation contract has the following principal contents: 1. The cooperation purposes and duration; 2. Full name and place of residence of the individual; name and head office of the legal entity; 3. Contributed property, if any; 4. Contributed labor, if any; 5. The mode of distributing yields and/or profits; 6. Rights and obligations of cooperative members; 7. Rights and obligations of the representative, if any; 8. Conditions for participating in and withdrawing from cooperation contracts, if any; 9. Conditions for termination of cooperation.
Bộ luật dân sự@506: Common property of cooperative members 1. Property contributed and jointly created by members and other property as prescribed by law are common property in proportion to the shares of cooperative members. If a cooperative member delays the contribution as agreed upon, he/she shall pay interests on the late payment as prescribed in Article 357 of this Code and pay compensation for damage. 2. The disposition of property being land use rights, houses, production workshops and other production means must be agreed in writing by all members; the disposition of other property shall be decided by representatives of members, unless otherwise agreed. 3. Common property must not be divided before the termination of the cooperation contract, unless it is so agreed upon by all cooperative members. The division of common property specified in this Clause does not change or terminate rights and obligations established and performed before the time of division of property.
Bộ luật dân sự@507: Rights and obligations of cooperative members 1. To enjoy yields and profits earned from cooperation activities. 2. To participate in deciding on matters related to the performance of cooperation contracts and supervise cooperation activities. 3. To pay compensation for damage caused to other cooperative members due to their faults. 4. Exercise other rights and obligations under the contract.
Bộ luật dân sự@508: Establishing and performing civil transactions 1. In case cooperative members designate a representative, this representative shall be the representative in the establishment and performance of the civil transaction. 2. Where cooperative members do not appoint a representative, they must jointly enter into and perform the civil transaction, unless otherwise agreed. 3. Civil transactions established and performed by entities specified in Clauses 1 and 2 of this Article give rise to rights and obligations of all cooperative members.
Bộ luật dân sự@509: Civil liability of cooperative members Cooperative members shall take common civil liability with common property. If the common property is insufficient for the performance of common obligations, cooperative members shall take responsibility with their own property in proportion to their contributions, unless otherwise provided for by cooperation contracts or law.
Bộ luật dân sự@510: Withdrawal from cooperation contract 1. A member may withdraw from a cooperation contract in the following cases : a/The conditions agreed upon in the cooperation contract; b/Having plausible reasons and obtaining the consent of more than half of the total cooperative members. 2. Members withdrawing from cooperation contracts may request the return of contributed assets, be divided assets in the common assets and shall pay for their obligations as agreed upon. In case the division of assets in kind affects cooperation activities, assets shall be valued in cash for division. The withdrawal from a cooperation contract does not terminate the rights and obligations of this person, which are established and performed before the withdrawal. 3. If the withdrawal from a cooperation contract does not fall into the cases specified in Clause 1 of this Article, the withdrawing member shall be identified as the violating party and shall fulfill civil liability in accordance with this Code and relevant laws.
Bộ luật dân sự@511: Engagement Letter Unless otherwise provided for by the cooperation contract, a natural or juridical person may become a new member of the contract if it is so consented by more than half of the total number of cooperative members.
Bộ luật dân sự@512: Termination of cooperation contract 1. A cooperation contract shall terminate in the following cases : a/Under the agreement of cooperative members; b/The time limit stated in the cooperation contract expires; c) Objectives of cooperation; d) The inspection is carried out under a decision of a competent authority; dd) Other cases prescribed in this Code and relevant laws. 2. Upon termination of a cooperation contract, all debts arising from the contract must be paid; if the common property is not enough to pay the debts, the cooperative members' private property must be taken for payment according to the provisions of Article 509 of this Code. Where the debts have been fully repaid but the common properties still exist, they shall be divided to cooperative members in proportion to each person's contributions, except otherwise agreed upon.
Bộ luật dân sự@513: Engagement Letter Service contract means an agreement between parties whereby a service provider performs an act for a service user and the service user shall pay a service charge to the service provider.
Bộ luật dân sự@514: Subject matter of the engagement Subject matter of a service contract is work which can be performed without violation of law and social ethics.
Bộ luật dân sự@515: Obligations of service users 1. To provide the service provider with information, documents and necessary means for the performance of the work, if so agreed upon or required. 2. To pay service charges to service providers as agreed upon.
Bộ luật dân sự@516: Rights of service users 1. To request service providers to perform jobs strictly according to the quality, quantity, time limit, location and other agreements. 2. In case the service provider seriously breaches its obligations, the service user may unilaterally terminate the contract performance and claim compensation for damage.
Bộ luật dân sự@517: Obligations of service providers 1. To perform jobs strictly according to the prescribed quality, quantity, time limit, location and other agreements. 2. Do not assign other persons to perform the work without the consent of the service user. 3. To preserve and return to service users documents and means they have been provided after completing their work. 4. Promptly inform service users of incomplete information and documents or poor quality of equipment for completing work. 5. To keep confidential information they know during the time of performing their jobs, if so agreed upon or provided for by law. 6. Compensate service users for any loss or damage to documents or means delivered or disclosure of confidential information.
Bộ luật dân sự@518: Rights of service providers 1. To request service users to provide information, documents and means for performing their jobs. 2. To change the service conditions for the interests of the service users without necessarily waiting for the services users' opinions if the waiting for opinions will cause damage to the service users, but to immediately notify the service users thereof. 3. Require the client to pay for the services.
Bộ luật dân sự@519: Service Charge 1. Service users shall have to pay service charges as agreed upon. 2. When entering into a contract, if there is no agreement on service charge rates and method of determining service charge rates and no other guidance on service charge rates, the service charge rates shall be determined on the basis of the market prices of services of the same type at the time and place of entering into the contract. 3. The client must pay the fee for the services provided at the location where the work is performed, unless otherwise agreed. 4. Where the services provided fail to reach the agreement or the work is not completed on time, the service users may reduce the service charge and demand compensation for damage.
Bộ luật dân sự@520: Unilateral termination of service contract performance 1. In case the continued performance of the work is not beneficial to the service user, the service user may unilaterally terminate the contract performance but shall have to notify the service provider thereof in a reasonable time in advance; the service user shall have to pay remuneration for the service part already performed by the service provider and pay compensation for damage. 2. In case the service user seriously breaches its obligations, the service provider may unilaterally terminate the contract performance and claim compensation for damage.
Bộ luật dân sự@521: Continuation of the Engagement After the expiry of the time limit for performance of jobs under the service contract, if the jobs have not yet been completed and the service provider continues performing the jobs, the service user knows but does not object, the service contract shall automatically continue performing the jobs according to the agreed contents until the jobs are completed.
Bộ luật dân sự@522: Passenger transport contract Passenger transport contract means an agreement between parties whereby the carrier transports passengers and luggage to the designated place as agreed upon and passengers shall have to pay freight.
Bộ luật dân sự@523: Form of passenger transport contract 1. A passenger transport contract may be made in writing, verbal or concretely actuated. 2. A ticket is an evidence of the conclusion of a passenger transport contract between the parties.
Bộ luật dân sự@524: Obligations of the carrier 1. To transport passengers from the departure places to the right places and on time by the agreed means in a safe manner and according to the prescribed routes; to ensure enough space for passengers and not to transport them beyond their tonnage. 2. To buy civil liability insurance for passengers according to law provisions. 3. To ensure the departure time already notified or agreed upon. 4. Carry the baggage and return it to the passenger or the person entitled to take the baggage at the agreed place on time and on schedule. 5. To refund to passengers the freight as agreed upon or provided for by law.
Bộ luật dân sự@525: Rights of the carrier 1. Require passengers to pay fully the passenger transport charges and the charges for transporting their luggage in excess of the prescribed limits. 2. Refuse to carry passengers in the following cases: a) The passenger fails to comply with the regulations of the carrier or commits acts of causing public disorder, obstructing the work of the carrier, threatening the life, health and property of other persons or committing other acts of failing to ensure safety in the journey; in this case, the passenger shall not be refunded the freight and shall have to pay a fine for his/her violation, if so provided for by the transport statute; b) Due to the health conditions of the passengers, the carriers clearly see that the transportation will cause danger to such passengers or other persons on the journeys; c) To prevent the spread of epidemics.
Bộ luật dân sự@526: Obligations of passengers 1. Pay fully passenger transport fares and luggage transport fares in excess of the prescribed limits and preserve by themselves their accompanied luggage. 2. To be present at the departure place on time as agreed upon. 3. Respect and comply with regulations of the carrier and other regulations on traffic safety assurance.
Bộ luật dân sự@527: Rights of passengers 1. To request the right means of transport to carry the goods and the value of goods at the freight rate according to the agreed road map. 2. To be exempt from freight for their checked luggage and hand luggage within the limits agreed upon or prescribed by law. 3. To request payment of arising expenses or compensation for damage, if the carrier is at fault in failing to transport goods within the agreed time limit and at the agreed place. 4. To receive back the whole or part of the freight in the cases stipulated in sub-clauses (b) and (c) of article 525 of this Code and in other cases stipulated by law or agreed upon. 5. To receive the baggage at the agreed place on time and according to the set schedule. 6. Request the temporary suspension of the journey within the time limit and according to the procedures prescribed by law.
Bộ luật dân sự@528: Liability for damage compensation 1. Where the life, health and luggage of a passenger are damaged, the carrier shall have to pay compensation therefor according to the provisions of law. 2. Unless otherwise provided for by law, the carrier is not required to pay compensation for damage to the life, health and luggage of passengers if such damage is wholly the fault of the passenger. 3. Where passengers breach the agreed conditions for transport and the provisions of the transport charter, thus causing damage to the carrier or the third party, they shall have to pay compensation therefor.
Bộ luật dân sự@529: Unilateral termination of the performance of the passenger transport contract 1. The carrier shall be entitled to unilaterally terminate the performance of the contract in the event specified in clause 2 Article 525 hereof. 2. The passenger has the right to unilaterally terminate the contract in the event that the carrier breaches the obligations referred to in paragraph 1,3 and 4 Article 524 hereof. Subsection 2 PROPERTY TRANSPORT CONTRACTS
Bộ luật dân sự@530: Contract for transport of property Contract for transport of property means an agreement between parties whereby the carrier is obliged to deliver the property to the agreed place and deliver it to the person entitled to receive it, and the charterer is obliged to pay freight.
Bộ luật dân sự@531: Form of property transport contract 1. A contract for transport of property shall be made in writing, verbally or by specific acts. 2. Bill of lading or other equivalent transport document is evidence of the conclusion of a contract between the parties.
Bộ luật dân sự@532: Delivery of the property to the carrier 1. The customer is obliged to deliver the property to the carrier on time and at the designated place and pack it in accordance with the agreed specifications; and to bear all costs of loading and unloading the property onto the means of transport, unless otherwise agreed. 2. Where the transport hirer delivers the property not on time and at the agreed place, he/she shall have to pay the waiting cost and freight for transportation of the property to the place agreed upon in the contract to the carrier. If the carrier is late in receiving the property at the agreed place, it shall be liable for any costs incurred due to such late receipt.
Bộ luật dân sự@533: Freight 1. The freight rates shall be agreed upon by the parties; if the law provides for freight rates, such freight rates shall apply. 2. Unless otherwise agreed, the charterer must pay the full freight after the property is loaded onto the transport means.
Bộ luật dân sự@534: Obligations of the carrier 1. Ensure the transport of property in full and safely to the designated place and on schedule. 2. Deliver the property to the entitled recipient. 3. To bear expenses related to the transportation of property, unless otherwise agreed upon. 4. To buy civil liability insurance in accordance with law. 5. To pay compensation to the shipping hirer in cases where the carrier loses or damages the property, except otherwise agreed upon or provided for by law.
Bộ luật dân sự@535: Rights of the carrier 1. Check the authenticity of the property, the bill of lading or other equivalent transport documents. 2. Refuse to transport property other than the types of property agreed upon in the contract. 3. To request the shipping hirer to fully pay the freight charges on time. 4. Refuse to transport property prohibited from trading, dangerous or hazardous property if the carrier knows or should know.
Bộ luật dân sự@536: Obligations of the customer 1. To pay fully freight to the carrier within the agreed time limit and by the agreed mode. 2. Provide necessary information relating to the property to ensure the safety of the property. 3. To look after the property en route, if so agreed upon. Where the transport hirer looks after the property but the property is lost or damaged, no compensation shall be made.
Bộ luật dân sự@537: Rights of the customer 1. To request the carrier to transport the property to the agreed place and time. 2. Directly receive or appoint a third party to receive the property.
Bộ luật dân sự@538: Deliver the property to the property recipient 1. The recipient of property may be the customer or a third party designated by the customer to receive the property. 2. The carrier shall deliver the property in full, on time and at the place agreed upon to the property recipient. 3. Where property has been delivered to the place of delivery on time but there is no recipient, the carrier may deposit such property at the place of bailment and must immediately notify the charterer or the third party designated by the charterer to receive the property. The charterer or the third party designated by the charterer to receive the property must bear reasonable costs incurred from the bailment of the property. The obligation to deliver property shall be fulfilled when the property has been deposited and the charterer or a third party designated by the charterer to receive the property has been informed of the deposit.
Bộ luật dân sự@539: Obligations of the recipient of property 1. To produce to the carrier bills of lading or other equivalent transport documents and receive the property on time and at the agreed place. 2. To bear the costs of loading and unloading the transported property, unless otherwise agreed upon or provided for by law. 3. To pay reasonable expenses arising from the late receipt of property. 4. If the recipient is a third party appointed by the customer, the customer must notify the customer of the receipt of the property and other necessary information at the customer's request.
Bộ luật dân sự@540: Rights of the recipient of property 1. Inspect the quantity and quality of the property to be transported. 2. Receive the property. 3. Require the carrier to pay reasonable expenses incurred due to the waiting for receipt of the property if the carrier is late in delivering the property. 4. To request the carrier to pay compensation for damage caused by the loss of or damage to property.
Bộ luật dân sự@541: Liability for damage compensation 1. The carrier must compensate the shipper for any loss of or damage to the property, except for the case specified in Clause 3 Article 536 of this Code. 2. The customer must compensate the carrier and the third party for damage caused by the dangerous or hazardous nature of the property without packing or safety assurance measures during the transportation. 3. In force majeure circumstances, which lead to the loss, damage or destruction of the transported property in the course of transportation, the carrier is not liable to pay compensation for damage, unless otherwise agreed upon or provided for by law.
Bộ luật dân sự@542: Processing contract Processing contract means an agreement between parties whereby the processor performs the job to create products at the request of the principal, who receives the products and pays the remuneration.
Bộ luật dân sự@543: Subject matter of the processing contract The object of a processing contract is an object which is pre-determined according to a set form and criteria agreed upon by the parties or provided for by law.
Bộ luật dân sự@544: The outsourcing ordering party's obligations 1. Supply raw materials and materials in a sufficient quantity, quality, within the agreed time limit and at the agreed place to the processor; and provide necessary documents related to the processing. 2. To guide the processor in performing the contract. 3. To pay remuneration as agreed upon.
Bộ luật dân sự@545: Rights of the ordering party 1. To receive processed products strictly according to the agreed quantity, quality, mode, time limit and place. 2. To unilaterally terminate the performance of the contract and claim compensation for damage when the processor commits serious breaches of the contract. 3. Where the products fail to ensure the quality and the processing-ordering party agrees to receive the products and request the repair but the processor cannot repair them within the agreed time limit, the processing-ordering party may cancel the contract and request compensation for damage.
Bộ luật dân sự@546: The outsourcing taking party's obligations 1. To preserve raw materials and materials supplied by the processing-ordering party. 2. Notify the supplier of the change of raw materials if the raw materials fail to meet the quality requirements; refuse to carry out the processing if the use of raw materials may create products harmful to society. 3. To deliver products to the processing-ordering party strictly according to the agreed quantity, quality, mode, time limit and place. 4. To keep confidential information on processing processes and products. 5. To take responsibility for the quality of products, except for cases where products fail to ensure the quality due to raw materials supplied by the processing-ordering party or unreasonable instructions of the processing-ordering party. 6. Return the remaining raw materials to the supplier after the contract is completed.
Bộ luật dân sự@547: Rights of the processor 1. To request the processing-ordering party to deliver raw materials and materials strictly according to the agreed quality, quantity, time limit and place. 2. To reject unreasonable instructions of the ordering party in the course of contract performance if deeming that such instructions may reduce product quality, but to immediately notify such to the ordering party. 3. To request the processing-ordering party to fully pay the processing remuneration according to the agreed time limit and mode.
Bộ luật dân sự@548: Risk taking responsibility Until the products are delivered to the ordering party, the party that owns the raw materials shall bear the risks of the raw materials or products made from such raw materials, unless otherwise agreed upon. If the supplier is late in receiving the products, it shall be liable for the risks incurred during the period of late receipt, including the case where the products are made from the raw materials of the processor, unless otherwise agreed. If the processor delays delivery of products and poses risks to processed products, it shall pay compensation for damage caused to the principal.
Bộ luật dân sự@549: Delivery and receipt of processed products The processor shall have to deliver the products and the processee shall have to receive the products on time and at the agreed place.
Bộ luật dân sự@550: Late delivery and acceptance of processed products 1. Where the processor is late in delivering products, the supplier may extend the time limit; if past such time limit the processor still fails to complete the work, the supplier may unilaterally terminate the performance of the contract and demand compensation for damage. 2. Where the supplier is late in receiving the products, the processor may deposit such products at the place of deposit and must immediately notify the supplier. The obligation to deliver the products shall be fulfilled when the agreed conditions are met and the supplier has been notified. The supplier must bear all costs arising from the deposit.
Bộ luật dân sự@551: Unilateral termination of the processing contract 1. Each party may unilaterally terminate the performance of a processing contract if the continued performance of the contract does not bring about its benefits, unless otherwise agreed upon or provided for by law, but shall have to notify the other party thereof in a reasonable time in advance. 2. If the supplier unilaterally terminates the performance of the contract, it shall pay a wage corresponding to the work done, unless otherwise agreed. If the processor unilaterally terminates the performance of the contract, it shall not be paid a wage, unless otherwise agreed. 3. The party unilaterally terminating the performance of the contract, thus causing damage to the other party, shall have to pay compensation therefor.
Bộ luật dân sự@552: Payment of fees 1. The ordering party shall have to fully pay the processing remuneration at the time of receiving products, except otherwise agreed upon. 2. In case of no agreement on the remuneration level, the average remuneration level shall apply to the creation of products of the same type at the place of processing and at the time of payment. 3. The ordering party has no right to reduce the remuneration if the products fail to ensure the quality due to the raw materials and materials supplied by the ordering party or due to its unreasonable instructions.
Bộ luật dân sự@553: Liquidation of raw materials When the processing contract terminates, the processor shall have to return the remaining raw materials and materials to the processing hirer, except otherwise agreed upon.
Bộ luật dân sự@554: Contract for bailment of property Contract for bailment of property means an agreement between parties whereby the bailee takes over the property from the bailor for safekeeping and returns such property to the bailor upon expiry of the contract, the bailor must pay a fee to the bailee, except for cases where the bailment is not subject to payment of a fee.
Bộ luật dân sự@555: Obligations of the depositor 1. Upon delivery of property, the bailor must immediately notify the bailee of the condition of the property and appropriate measures to preserve the property. If the bailee fails to notify the bailee of the property which is lost or damaged due to improper preservation, the bailor must compensate for any damage caused. 2. To pay the fee in full, on time and by the mode agreed upon.
Bộ luật dân sự@556: Rights of the depositor 1. To request the recovery of property at any time, if the bailment contract does not specify the time limit, but to give reasonable prior notice to the bailee. 2. To request compensation for damage if the bailee causes loss of or damage to the bailee's property, except in force majeure circumstances.
Bộ luật dân sự@557: Obligations of the bailee 1. To preserve the property as agreed upon, and return the property to the bailor in the same condition as when receiving it for safekeeping. 2. Change the way of preserving property only if such change is necessary to better preserve such property, but must immediately notify the bailor of such change. 3. To promptly notify the bailor of the danger of damage or destruction of the property due to the nature of such property and request the bailor to indicate the solution within a time limit; if past such time limit the bailor fails to reply, the bailee may take necessary measures to preserve the property and request the bailor to pay expenses. 4. Compensate for any loss or damage to the property, except in force majeure events.
Bộ luật dân sự@558: Rights of the bailee 1. To request the depositor to pay the remuneration as agreed upon. 2. Request the bailor to pay reasonable expenses for the custody of the property in case the bailment is not paid. 3. Request the bailor to receive the property at any time, but give reasonable prior notice to the bailor in case of immature bailment. 4. Sell the property in danger of being damaged or destroyed in order to ensure the interests of the depositor, notify such to the depositor and pay the proceeds from the sale of the property to the depositor, after subtracting the reasonable expenses for the sale of the property.
Bộ luật dân sự@559: Returning deposited property 1. The bailee must return the very property received and the yield, if any, unless otherwise agreed. The place of delivery of a property deposited in custody shall be the place of bailment; if the bailor requests the delivery of the property at another place, he/she shall have to bear the freight to that place, unless otherwise agreed. 2. The bailee must return the property on time and may only request the bailor to retrieve the property on time, if there is a plausible reason.
Bộ luật dân sự@560: Late delivery and receipt of deposited property If the bailee delays delivery of the property, it shall not be allowed to request the bailor to pay bailment fees and costs for custody of the property from the date of delay and shall be liable for any risks to the property during the delay. Where the bailor is late in receiving the property, he/she must pay the costs of preservation and remuneration to the bailee during the late time of receipt.
Bộ luật dân sự@561: Payment of fees 1. The bailor must pay full remuneration when taking back the property, unless otherwise agreed. 2. In case the parties fail to reach agreement on the remuneration level, the average remuneration level at the place and time of remuneration payment shall apply. 3. Where the bailor takes back the property ahead of time, he/she shall still have to pay the full remuneration and necessary expenses arising from the return of the property ahead of time by the bailee, unless otherwise agreed. 4. Where the bailee requests the bailor to recover the property ahead of time, the bailee shall not be entitled to the remuneration and shall have to compensate the bailor for any damage, except otherwise agreed.
Bộ luật dân sự@562: Authorization contract Authorization contracts mean agreements between the parties whereby the authorized party is obliged to perform the work on behalf of the authorizer. The authorizer shall pay remuneration only if so agreed upon or provided for by law.
Bộ luật dân sự@563: Authorization duration The authorization duration shall be agreed upon by the parties or prescribed by law; if there is no agreement and no regulation of law, the authorization contract shall be valid for one year from the date of establishment of authorization.
Bộ luật dân sự@564: Reauthorization 1. An authorized party may re-authorize another person in the following cases : a) The authorization is granted; b) Due to force majeure events, if re-authorization is not applied, the purposes of establishing and performing civil transactions for the interests of the authorizers are not able to be performed. 2. The re-authorization must not exceed the scope of the initial authorization. 3. The form of re-authorization contract must be consistent with the initial authorization form.
Bộ luật dân sự@565: Obligations of the authorized party 1. To perform the work as authorized and to report to the authorizing party on the performance of such work. 2. Notify the third party in the authorization relation of the time limit and scope of authorization and the amendment and supplementation of the scope of authorization. 3. To preserve and preserve documents and means assigned to them for the performance of authorization. 4. To keep confidential information they know while performing the authorization. 5. To return to the authorizing party the received property and benefits gained in the course of performing the authorization as agreed upon or provided for by law. 6. Compensate for damage caused by the breach of obligations prescribed in this Article.
Bộ luật dân sự@566: Rights of the authorized party 1. To request the authorizing party to supply necessary information, documents and means for the performance of the authorization. 2. To be paid reasonable expenses they have paid for the performance of their authorized work; to enjoy remuneration, if so agreed upon.
Bộ luật dân sự@567: The mandate's obligations 1. To provide necessary information, documents and means for the authorized party to perform the work. 2. To take responsibility for commitments made by the authorized party within the scope of authorization. 3. To pay reasonable expenses paid by the authorized party for the performance of the authorized work; to pay remuneration to the authorized party, if so agreed upon.
Bộ luật dân sự@568: Rights of the authorizing party 1. To request the authorized party to fully notify the performance of the authorized work. 2. To request the authorized party to return assets and benefits gained from the performance of the authorized act, unless otherwise agreed upon. 3. To be compensated for damage if the authorized party breaches the obligations specified in Article 565 of this Code.
Bộ luật dân sự@569: Unilateral termination of performance of authorization contract 1. In case of commission, the authorizer may terminate unilaterally the performance of the contract at any time but shall pay remuneration to the authorized party corresponding to the work performed by the authorized party and pay compensation for damage; if the authorization does not entail remuneration, the authorizer may terminate the performance of the contract at any time but shall have to give reasonable prior notice to the authorized party. The authorizing party shall have to notify in writing the third party of the termination of the contract performance by the authorizing party; if the latter does not, the contract with the third party shall still be valid, except where the third party knows or should know that the authorization contract has been terminated. 2. In case of commission without remuneration, the authorized party may terminate unilaterally the performance of the contract at any time but shall have to notify the authorizer thereof in reasonable time in advance; if commission is paid, the authorized party may terminate unilaterally the performance of the contract at any time and shall have to pay compensation for damage to the authorizer, if any.
Bộ luật dân sự@570: Promises of rewards 1. The person who has publicly promised a reward shall pay a reward to the person who has performed the job at the request of the reward promiseer. 2. The work to be promised rewards must be specific, be able to be performed, not violate the prohibitions of law, not contravene social ethics.
Bộ luật dân sự@571: Withdrawal of the award statement Before the time limit for commencement of performance of an act, the prize-priving person may withdraw his/her prize-promising statement. The withdrawal of a prize-promising statement must be effected in the same manner and on the same means as the announced reward.
Bộ luật dân sự@572: Payout 1. Where an act which is promised reward is performed by one person, when such act is completed, the person performing such act shall be awarded. 2. When an act of which a reward is promised is performed by many persons but each of them performs it independently, the first person to complete it shall be awarded the reward. 3. Where many persons complete the work promised rewards at the same time, the reward shall be equally divided among such persons. 4. In case many persons collaborate to perform the work promised for reward at the request of the reward promiseer, each of them will receive part of the reward corresponding to his/her contributions.
Bộ luật dân sự@573: Award contest 1. The organization of cultural, art, sport, scientific and technical contests and other contests must not violate the prohibitions of law and must not contravene social ethics. 2. The organizers of contests must announce the conditions for participation in the contests, the score scale, prizes and the prize level of each prize. The change of the contest conditions must be made in the announced way for a reasonable time before the contest takes place. 3. Award winners may request organizers to award prizes at the announced level.
Bộ luật dân sự@574: Perform Work Without Proxy Performance of an act without authorization means a person who is not obliged to perform an act but has voluntarily performed such act for the benefit of the beneficiary of the act, when this beneficiary is unaware or knows about it without objection.
Bộ luật dân sự@575: The obligation to perform work without authorization 1. A person performing an act without authorization is obliged to perform the act in accordance with his/her capabilities and conditions. 2. A person performing an act without authorization must perform the act as if it were his/her own. If he/she knows or guesses the intention of the person performing the act, he/she must perform the act in accordance with such intention. 3. A person performing an act without authorization shall notify the beneficiary of the process and results of the performance of the act, if so requested, unless the beneficiary already knows or the person performing the act without authorization does not know his/her place of residence or office. 4. Where a person whose work is performed dies, or where the person is an individual or where the person is a juridical person, the person performing the work without authorization must continue performing the work until the heirs or representatives of the persons whose work is performed have accepted the work. 5. In case a person performing an act without authorization cannot continue performing the act for a plausible reason, he/she shall notify such to the person whose act is performed, his/her representative or relative, or may ask another person to perform the act on his/her behalf.
Bộ luật dân sự@576: Payment obligations of persons having their jobs performed 1. The person whose work is performed must receive the work when the person performing the work without authorization hand over the work and pay reasonable expenses paid by the person performing the work without authorization, even when the work does not achieve the results he/she wishes. 2. A person whose work is performed must pay a remuneration to a person performing an act without authorization when such person performs the work thoughtfully and in his/her own interest, unless the person performing the act without authorization refuses to do so.
Bộ luật dân sự@577: Liability to compensate for damage 1. When a person performing an act without authorization intentionally causes damage while performing the act, he/she shall pay compensation to the person whose act is performed. 2. If the person performing an act without authorization unintentionally causes damage while performing the act, he/she may, based on the circumstances of his/her work, be entitled to a reduction in the compensation level.
Bộ luật dân sự@578: Termination of performance of tasks without authorization The performance of an act without authorization shall terminate in the following cases: 1. At the request of the person whose work is performed; 2. The person whose work is performed, his/her heir or representative shall receive the work; 3. The person performing the act without authorization is unable to continue performing the act as prescribed in Clause 5, Article 575 of this Code; 4.
